077-104a phung po 'byung ba yul dang yul can gzhan yang dbang po lnga la sogs pa dang / /phyogs sa phyogs kyi stobs dang dpal ldan rgyal sras dbang rnams kyis kyang lha mo rnam par sbyang bar bya/ 34 /lhun po'i phyogs su dbye ba brgyad kyi phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas gnas dang nye ba'i gnas kun dang / /zhing dang tshan+do ha dang 'dus pa dur khrod sa dang khyim ni rlung gi phyed kyi mtshams su ste/ /'di dag sangs rgyas sa ni nyi ma phra mo lus skyes mi dang 'byung po lha dang lha min dang / /nus dang gtso bo nyin gcig rigs ldan ma ni rnam par rgyu ste nyi zla'i rab tu rgyu ba las/ 35 /rgyab tu lha mo dbang byed thim pa zhes 'dir mdun du de nyid lnga yi rang bzhin rnams kyis te/ /rlung dang dbang ldan lha min me dang 'og dang mkha' dang lha dang gshin rje gnod sbyin nub tu yang / /gtsug tor snying ga'i phyogs dang mgrin pa mgo bo la gnas lte ba dang ni gsang ba'i 'khor lo la/ /'khor lo rtsibs brgyad 'og dang steng du nyin zhag so so'i chu srin nas ni dus sbyor gnyis gnyis bar/ 36 /gtso bo'i chu skyes rdo rje kun dang 'gyur med thig le rnams kyis rdo rje nor bu la gnas pa/ /kun nas dga' ba thams cad rdo rje can gyi bde ba mnyam pa'i gnas te dus ni thams cad do/ /zla ba zhu ba bla ma'i zhal de ru ni gang zhig zhugs pa dus kyi 'khor lo de nyid de/ /bdud rnams kyi ni dus su gsungs shing 'chi ba'i 'jigs byed mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor lo 'di dag go/ 37 /shes rab thabs kyi yi ge dag gis gnyi ga'i rigs kyi dbang las mkha' 'gro ma dang mkha' 'gro'i ming / /rdo rje gsum po rkang pa gzhan dang bcas pas thog ma dbus dang mtha' mar phye ba bzlas bya ste/ /srog gis byin gyis brlabs pa gang zhig gnyi ga'i bgrod pa'i dbang gis rang rang las kyi rjes mthun pa'o/ /ro yi 'gro rnams la gnas mkha' 'gro ma dang rdo rje mkha' 'gro rnams ni myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ 38 /dbugs rnams gang dag skye ba'i dus su dbu ma la ni rkang pa dang bcas ro dang mngar gyur pa/ /de brgyad rnams kyis 'khor lor 'gyur te 'og dang mkha' yi dbang gis sgo yi dbus gnas lha mo rnams/ /

208
077-104b rkang pa gcig gis bskyed pa srid pa gsum gyi yum ste phyag na gri gug dang ni thod pa can/ /bdud rtsi bde ba'i cha yis 'khyud pa nyi ma zla ba'i steng du g.yas brkyang dus kyi 'khor lo'o/ 39 /lnga gsum me lce yul dang yon tan dbang gis zla ba nyi ma'i gdan rnams chu gter rkang pa las/ / gza' bdun dang ni rdzogs pa nyi ma nyin mor byed dang ri bong can gyi gdan ni gzhan pa rnams/ /nag po dkar po'i rdzogs pa nyi ma nyin mor byed dang ri bong can gyi gdan ni gzhan rnams dang / /'di nyid la ni ri bo'i gza' rnams mnyam dang mi mnyam gnas la nyi ma zla ba'i gdan rnams so/ 40 /zla ba nyi ma'i rkang pa rtsibs rnams dang ni pad+ma'i 'dab ma sgo bzhi zur gyi ro rnams te/ /slar yang rkang pa nyis 'gyur de dag rnams ni nyin mor byed dang ri bong can gyi gdan rnams nyid/ /rdzogs pa gza' dang nyi ma'i rkang pa mnyam dang mi mnyam gnas la chu gter rkang pa gdan rnams te/ /nyi ma 'am ni gang ba'i zla ba la 'gyur rigs kyi dbang gis gtso bo yang na kha sbyor la/ 41 /rlung la reg bya'i zhal gcig dang ni yon tan gzhan gyis dbang gis rgyas gdab zhal ni gnyis pa'o/ /rtse mo can la gzugs dang reg bya'i zhal ni gnyis su 'gyur te rgyas gdab zhal ni gsum pa'o/ /chu la zhal yang reg bya dang ni gzugs dang ro yi zhal te rgyas gdab zhal ni bzhi pa'o/ /sa la dri la sogs pa reg bya'i mtha' yi yon tan zhal te rgyas gdab zhal ni lnga pa'o/ 42 /nam mkha' la ni zhal yang stong pa rnam pa lnga ste rgya yis gdab pa'i zhal ni drug pa'o/ /de bzhin du ni ye shes khams la 'gyur te yon tan dbang las stong pa drug gi zhal rnams so/ /gcig ni bzhi la bsres pa bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba dag ste gnyis dang gsum ni bsres pa lnga/ /shes rab thabs ni zhal bcu yon tan rnam pa gsum gyi dbang gis zhal ni bcu gnyis rnam pa bzhi/ 43 /thun mtshams dbye bas rnam pa bzhi ste rnam pa gsum gyi zhal yang dus sbyor dbye bas kha dog gsum/ /dus sbyor phyed pa phyag gi dbye ba mi mnyam mnyam pa 'khyud pa dag kyang lus dang sems la ni/ /thun mtshams cha shas snga phyi las te

209
077-105a zhal gsum ro yi phyag ni 'khyud pa dbu ma'i cha shas la/ /shes rab sbyor dang snyoms par zhugs pa dag kyang dgos pa la sogs rnams ni thun gyi mngon mtshams la'o/ 44 /shes rab yan lag dmar dang ser po la ni nges par dus kyi 'khor lo'i bsam pa rab tu 'jug /rdo rje can gyi g.yon mdun yan lag dkar dang sprin nag mtshungs pa dag la shes rab bsam pa'o/ /mchog gi lus la shes rab bsam pas phye ba g.yon dang mdun gyi yan lag dag ni zhi bar 'gyur/ /drag po g.yas dang rgyab kyi yan lag mchog gi rgyal ba'i bdag po'i bsam pas phye ba de bzhin nyid/ 45 /shes rab kyis phye rgyal ba dag gi rab mchog tshogs kyi rigs ni gnyis kyi rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur/ /shes rab kyi ni gtso bos phye ba nges par phyogs bral du yang rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs nyid de/ /g.yas dang g.yas min nyi ma dang ni ri bong can gyi sku dag zung ste shar dang nub nyid kyang / /nag po ser po dag ste sngon po ljang gu dag kyang de bzhin mkha' dang sa 'og yang dag gnas/ 46 /dkar po rnams kyi shes rab dmar mo dmar po rnams kyi ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar de bzhin nyid/ /ser po rnams kyi kha dog nag mo dkar min rigs rnams kyi yang mchog gi gser dang mtshungs pa'o/ /sngon po rnams kyi kha dog sna tshogs slar yang ljang gu rnams kyi sngon mo rnams su de bzhin gsungs/ /de bzhin nges par lha mo rnams kyi rang rigs phyogs su gnas pa'i lha rnams dag tu rig par bya/ 47 /shes rab rgyud ni shar nas slar yang rnal 'byor rjes su rig pa nyid ni nub kyi zhal nas so/ /g.yas kyi zhal nas rgyal ba'i bdag pos rnal 'byor rgyud gsungs g.yon gyi zhal nas bya ba la sogs so/ /shar nas rnal 'byor spyod pa nyid de slar yang nub kyi zhal nas nges par dbu ma mtha' dag go/ /mdo sde pa ni g.yas kyi zhal nas gsungs te dkar po'i zhal nas dag pa'i bye brag smra ba'o/ 48 /nub kyi zhal nas nges brjod rig byed dang ni rgyal ba'i dbang pos g.yon gyi zhal nas mchod sbyin gsungs/ /g.yas kyi zhal nas snyan tshig rig byed mchog gi bsreg bya'i rigs la srid srung

210
077-105b shar gyi zhal nas so/ /shar gyi zhal nas rigs can rgyud de slar yang nub kyi zhal nas mkha' lding dang ni 'byung po'i rgyud/ /g.yon gyi zhal nas zhi ba'i mtha' ste nyi ma 'char ka dang mtshungs g.yas pa nas ni khyab 'jug chos/ 49 /rgyab nas 'phral la ldog pa mchog tu dkar ba'i zhal nas g.yon gyi lha dang rab tu gnas pa ste/ /g.yas nas rig pa drag po min dang slar yang rlung gi zhal nas rlung skyes tshangs pa zhi ba dag /stong pa'i zhal nas stong pa dbang phyug dag ni srid gsum bdag pos 'jig rten pa yi don du spros/ /rdzogs ldan gsum ldan gnyis ldan dang ni gzhan pa rtsod dus rgyab kyi zhal la sogs pa'i dbye ba las/ 50 /de bzhin dpa' bo'i rim pa sogs dang nyi ma'i bgrod pa'i dbang gis thun mtshams bzhi po nyid dag dang / /kha zas dag ni g.yas kyi zhal nas mchog tu 'jigs pa dag kyang rgyab kyi zhal nas spros pa ste/ / mdun gyi zhal nas 'khrig pa nyid do mchog tu dkar ba'i zhal nas rgyal po rmi lam dag dang gnyid/ /rgyab nas rje rigs gnyis skyes mi yi bdag po dang ni de bzhin dmangs rigs dag kyang rim pas 'gyur/ 51 /rgyal ba'i bdag pos mdun nas thams cad yod par smra ba gsungs te g.yas nas mang pos bkur ba'o/ /rgyab kyi zhal nas gnas brtan pa ste slar yang dge 'dun phal chen pa ni g.yon gyi zhal nas so/ /mdun gyi zhal nas mi rnams dang ni slar yang rgyab kyi zhal nas dud 'gro rnams ni nges par spros/ /g.yas kyi zhal nas 'byung po lha rnams mchog tu dkar ba'i zhal nas dmyal ba rnams dang lha min rnams/ 52 /mdun gyi zhal nas spros pa dag kyang snying ga'i 'khor lo nas 'gyur rgyab zhal lte ba'i 'khor lo nas/ /g.yas kyi zhal nas longs spyod rdzogs pa nas 'gyur kun tu g.yon gyi zhal nas lhan cig skyes pa nas/ / 'khor lo rnams kyi zhal gyi dbus nas lus la dngos po spro ba dang ni sdud pa nyid du 'gyur/ /'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag rnams kyang rgyal ba skyed byed zhal gyi dbye ba rnams kyis yang dag go/ 53 /dpal ldan zla ba zla ba chu shel rnam par rtog pa med pa'i rang bzhin las ni chu 'byung ba/ /

211
077-106a de bzhin 'jig rten du ni rgyal ba'i bdag po'i phung po la brten thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos 'dzag ste/ /chu ni sa bon khams la kun tu brten nas ro mnyam 'gyur ba ji bzhin nyid du chos dag ni/ /sems can rnams kyi dag pa'i sems kyis rnam pa mang por 'gyur te sngon gyi las kyi mthu las so/ 54 /srid gsum gnas na sems can don gyi byed po dang ni yid bzhin nor bu la yang bsam pa med/ /sems la gnas te mi dge 'bras bu'i dbang gis sdig pa'i las can sems can rnams kyis mi mthong ste/ /yid bzhin nor bu'i skyon min mi dge ba dang dge ba'i 'bras bu sems can thams cad rab tu spyod/ /sems ni dag na mi de yang ni rgyal ba'i dbang por 'gyur te rgyal ba gzhan gyis ci zhig bya/ 55/ gang gis myu gu 'di skyed skyed par byed pa de ni dngos po skyes nas rnam par nyams par 'gyur/ /nyams pa de yis skyes par rab tu 'gyur te slar yang sa bon rgyal po dag gi skyed byed do/ /snga ma gang de gzhan gyi dngos las shi ba zhes pa'i tshig ste rang gi ngo bos skyes pa min/ /gang gis stong pa nas ni sa la 'ongs pa bde ba'i skad cig de yis stobs bcu 'gro bar 'gyur/ 56 /bde nas bde la rjes chags skad cig 'dir ni lhan skyes dngos po gzhan la rjes su chags pa min/ /phung po gang dag de yis bskyed rnams slar yang bde ba'i skad cig de yis skyed par byed pa ste/ /dag pa las chos de las gzhan te slar yang de las gzhan dang de las rnam par dag pa'o/ /dag pa'i sa la sa bon btab pa las ni rtsa ba rnams dang lo ma me tog 'bras bu bzhin/ 57 /sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang ro dang mchog gi ro ste phra rab dag ni rnam pa drug /dri la sogs pa re res dman zhing yul dang rnam par bral ba mtha' ma ye shes blta bya rnams/ /'dod pa gzugs dang gzugs med rnams ni zung dang zung dang ri bong can te mtha' ma chos kyi dbyings/ /rnam pa kun ldan de dag kun nas rtag tu 'pho med bde ba lhan skyes rten du gyur pa'o/ 58 /slar yang sa sogs khams la phan tshun du ni gtso bo'i dngos po dag la chung ba'i dngos rnams gnas/ /phan tshun phung po 'byung ba

212
077-106b dang ni yul dang yul can rnams dang phan tshun bdud dang ma rig pa/ /phan tshun rjes chags lnga ni ro yi 'gro rnams la gnas sdug bsngal dang ni bde ba'i skad cig gi/ /rnam pa thams cad pa rnams kun nas gzhan gyi yon tan mi dga' mi phyed rdo rje yang dag gnas/ 59 /de dag rnams kyi dus kyi 'khor lo rdzu 'phrul rab tu gsal byed chen po du ma sprul pa'i sku/ /rdo rje 'bar ba 'phro ba rnams kyis 'dod pa'i khams na gnas pa lha min dang ni mi rnams dang / /longs spyod rdzogs pas gzugs can rnams dang mkha' la rgyal ba'i sras sogs dgra bcom rnams la chos sku yis/ /stong pa'i cha yis srid gsum mtha' dag stong pa'i zad par rlung rnams kyis ni rlung gi zad par te/ 60 /me yi cha shas rnams kyis me yi zad par chu yang 'gro la spros pa'i chu yi cha rnams kyis/ /'dzin ma'i cha shas rnams kyis sa yi zad par tshogs pa'i yul rnams kyis ni dngos po'i rang bzhin kun/ /kun nas nam mkha' dag dang mtshungs pa gcig gi bdag nyid 'di ni dag pa'i sa la ston par byed/ /de ltar sangs rgyas skur 'gyur bde ba gcig pu'i rang bzhin phyir na 'chi bar yang ni mi 'gyur ro/ 61 /de gcig pu las rnam pa lnga ste mtha' dag rgyal ba mchog rnams kyis ni mngon rdzogs byang chub 'di/ /rnam pa nyi shu'i rang bzhin dang ni slar yang de nas sgyu 'phrul du ma'i rang gi ngo bo'o/ /de yi skad cig gcig ni bde mnyam 'bras bu ster bar 'gyur te las gzhan gyi ni rang bzhin min/ /'dir thabs 'pho med skad cig gang yin 'dir ni lhan skyes chos kyi dbyings su rab tu zhugs pa la'o/ 62 /mtha' yas sangs rgyas zhing rnams dang ni dpag med yon tan rnams dang nam mkha' la sogs khams rnams dang / /gnas dang skye dang nyams pa rnam gsum zhes pa'i srid pa dang ni 'gro ba drug tu sems can kun/ /sangs rgyas khro bo lha sogs rnams dang snying rje'i thugs ldan byang chub sems dpa' btsun mor bcas rnams te/ /'di dag rnams ni srid pa gsum gyis phyag byas rgyal ba bde 'byung gcig pu'i 'khor lo gcig yin no/ 63 /spu dang pags pa sha khrag ro dang bcas pa dag kyang de bzhin rus pa dang

213
077-107a ni rkang dang rtsa/ /de dag rnams la srog sogs rlung ste kun nas rlung gi dbus su nyi ma zla ba'i bgrod pa'o/ /zla ba'i dbus su dri med nor bu bzhin du dngos po kun gyis 'khyud pa'i rnam par shes pa ste/ /de ni dngos dang dngos med gnyis med nyid dang mchog gi bdud rtsi'i go 'phang khyab byed gzhom med do/ 64 /spu la sogs pa zla ba'i mtha' ni mtha' dag lus la gnas rnams gang zhig sa bcur gsungs pa rnams/ /sde pa drug dang la sogs gzhan rnams de dag dus kun rnal 'byor rnams la bde mnyam 'bras bu ster/ /de phyir bla ma'i zhabs la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis ni thar pa'i slad du btsal bar bya/ /lus las ma gtogs gang zhig khyab byed thar pa ster ba'i sangs rgyas gzhan ni 'ga' yang yod pa min/ 65 /sems can rnams ni sangs rgyas yin te sangs rgyas chen po gzhan 'dir 'jig rten khams na yod ma yin/ /de rnams mnyes par byas pas dpag med srid pa gcod par byed de rnam par mi rtog pa las so/ /rnal 'byor pa ni 'khu bar byed na dmyal ba ngu 'bod la sogs chen po'i mtha' ru 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de phyir sems ni dag pa na yang mkhas dang mi mkhas skye bo rnams la 'gal ba mi bya'o/ 66 /sems can dag dang 'grogs pa thob nas mi yi bdag po dag pa'i byams pa la sogs sems su 'gyur/ /mi dge'i yon tan dang ldan 'khor ba pa ni drug po rnams kyi zhe sdang chags sogs sems su 'gyur/ /dus kun tu ni byang chub sems kyang 'gro ba dang ni 'gro bar 'dod pa rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur/ /thar par 'jug pas dman zhing smod pa rnam par spangs pa dag ni thams cad dus su bdud kyi sems/ 67 /srid pa gsum gyi gnas su bdud rnams zhi ba min pa dang ni byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba byed/ /bdud kyi dbang po rdzu 'phrul gyis dman mchog tu 'jigs byed yin te ston pa gcig pu rdzu 'phrul ldan/ /bdud rnams kyi ni bdud kyi blo dang skyob pa rnams kyi bde ba'i blo gros gzhan gyi snying la 'jug /de phyir sangs rgyas mthu rnams kyis ni srid pa gsum po mtha' dag mtha' yas dus su 'jug

214
077-107b par 'gyur/ 68 /rgyal ba rnams kyis 'jig rten khams la tshad gsungs gang yin de yang mi rnams ye shes nyid ma yin/ /sangs rgyas rnams la lhan skyes lus kyi dbang gis khru ni gcig dang du ma dag gi tshad med de/ /las kyi sar ni srog chags rnams la sems can rjes mthun tshad dag rtag tu rab tu gsal bar byed/ /gal te tshad 'di bdag gi 'dod pa brjod na lha rnams kyis 'di med pa pa zhes brjod par 'gyur/ 69 /gang gi rgyal ba'i dbang po skyed cing nyin zhag so so'i dbang las gang gis mngal nas nges par 'byung / /skad cig gang gis 'gyur ba dag dang rnam par bral ba grub cing g.yo ba g.yo ba med gyur pa/ /sangs rgyas bya ba de spangs nas ni bde mnyam dang bral stong pa gzhan dag gang zhig sgom byed pa/ /de yi bskal pa bye ba du ma rnams kyis sangs rgyas nyid dang lhan skyes bde ba dag kyang ring / 70 / nim pa'i shing las rgun 'brum min te dug las bdud rtsi dang ni tshangs pa'i shing las 'dam skyes dang / /stong pa las ni myang 'das bde ba mi dge'i dbang las dge ba srog chags gsod las grub pa rnams/ /mchod sbyin dag las phyugs rnams mtho ris mchog tu zhi ba'i go 'phang dbang po rnams ni 'gog las min/ /rig byed las ni kun mkhyen gsung dang 'gyur med bde ba g.yo med 'gyur ba ma dag sems las min/ 71 /sems can rnams kyi sdig pa'i sems ni mi yi bdag po bdud kyi tshogs kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ /bsod nams ye shes rjes chags bde ster dag kyang rtag tu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis byin brlabs pa'o/ /gang phyir bde ba'i dam tshig dbang gis bdud dang nyon mongs bcom nas mya ngan 'das par 'gro byed pa/ /de phyir bdud rnams nyi ma so so'i dus su de dag rnams la du ma yis ni bgegs rnams byed/ 72 /rgyal ba'i lhan skyes bde ba 'di ni 'phel ba'i don slad dang por las kyi phyag rgya bsten par bya/ /de nas nyi ma'i gzugs ni lus dang gdong dang rkang pa gtsug tor yan lag thams cad rdzogs pa ste/ /glog gi dbyug pa'i rjes mthun 'pho med bde ba skyed par byed ma

215
077-108a mtshan nyid yan lag rab tu rdzogs/ /rdo rje rnams kyis rab tu snang bar byed ma srid gsum gnas lus chos kyi dbyings ni de nas 'gyur/ 73 /'gyur ba med pa'i bde ba'i 'bras ster phyag rgya bzhi po 'di rnams grong dang 'brog dgon dur khrod dang / /mi gtsang ba dang gtsang ba'i gnas dang khyim dang lha yi khang pa thams cad du ni dus kun tu/ /shin tu dga' ba'i dga' ba la gnas 'jig rten lam las rab grol rigs dang rigs min mngon spyod cing / /lus stobs bde ster bza' ba btung ba la sogs longs spyod dang ldan rnal 'byor rnams kyis bsgom par bya/ 74 /rlung ni yang dag phrad pa rnams kyis glog gi me yi rtse mos spyi bo'i zla ba zhu bar byed/ /thig le gang gang zhu ba 'di las mgrin pa snying ga la son lte ba gsang ba dag la 'gog /thig le las ni g.yo ba'i khu ba rdo rje nor bu la gnas rgyal mtshan rtse la 'gog pa gang / / de ni shes rab ye shes skad cig gal te thig le'i phreng ba 'pho ba med pas bde ster na'o/ 75 /de phyir g.yo med bde ba'i skad cig lhan cig skyes pa 'dir ni chos kyi dbyings kyis ster byed do/ /srog gis ro yi 'gro ba rnams la gnas pa thams cad bkug cing nyon mongs bdud rnams bcom byas nas/ /rdzu 'phrul kun mkhyen sa dang srid gsum bla ma nyid ni rnal 'byor rnams kyi skye ba 'di las te/ /gal te lam du rab zhugs shi bar 'gyur na de tshe de yi 'dzin pas skye ba gzhan la'o/ 76 /gang zhig yon tan med cing dngos chung yul dang rnam bral de ni sku yi phyag rgya rnam pa gnyis/ / de nas chags pa rjes chags dang ni yon tan gter gzhan dag kyang gsung gi rang bzhin rnam pa gnyis/ /gnag dang dkar la rjes chags yul gyi yon tan la dga' thugs kyi phyag rgya rnam pa gnyis 'gyur te/ /brgyad dang gnyis dang lnga dang lnga dang gsal bar mkha' dus dang ni stong pa rig byed dag gi lo/ 77 /rin chen dbang po mi 'byung bar du rgyal ba mchog skyed ma ni rnal 'byor pa yis bsrung bar bya/ /rin chen dbang po rab tu 'byung ba'i dus su mtha' dag yon tan gter gyi dkyil 'khor bzhengs byas nas/ /sangs rgyas byin brlabs sngags rnams

216
077-108b kyis ni gsang ba'i pad+mar bde mnyam sngags dang bcas pa spro bya ste/ /gsang bar bsrung ba rab tu byas nas rdo rje nor bu la gnas byang chub sems ni myang bar bya/ 78 /de la gang zhig bu ru gyur pa rgyal ba skyed byed sras po de ni 'jam pa'i rdo rje nyid/ /shes rab lhag pa las ni 'ga' zhig tshe na bu mor 'gyur te nges par sangs rgyas yum du 'gyur/ /de nas gzhan ma me tog gsum gyi pad+ma dkar 'dzin dza~M b+ha la dang phyag na rdo rje ste/ /me tog brgyad kyis gzhan brgyad phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas rdzu 'phrul tshad ldan khro bo'i rgyal po rnams/ 79 /zla ba de la rdul gang rab tu byung ba de ni slar yang 'jam dbyangs rab tu skyed pa ste/ /lo ni nyi shu dag gi bar du so so'i rdul la byang chub sems dpa' snying stobs chen po ste/ /de nas stong pa dang ni rig byed bar du cung zad snying stobs cha shas dman par rab tu 'gyur/ /slar yang lo ni nyi shu'i bar du de bas kyang ni snying stobs chung zhing brtson 'grus chung ba'o/ 80 /de nas skye gnas la ni rdul med yul ni rab tu bcom pa'o de nyams pa las dbang ma yin/ /'on kyang sa bon nyams pa la ni shes rab dbang bskur rgyal ba'i dbang po'i gsung gis sbyin par bya/ /de dag rnams kyi sa chu me rlung nam mkha'i yon tan rgyal ba'i yan lag dag gis btsal bar bya/ /byang chub sems kyi bsnyen pa 'di ni sems can don gyi byed pa mo ste 'bras bu mang por 'gyur/ 81 /gang zhig khrag ni 'thung byed rab mchog lha mi rnams kyi sbrang bu de ni bdud rtsi gcig pu ste/ /skyugs pa snying ga gsang ba'i kha nas rdo rje nor bu la gnas chu skyes nang du rab zhugs min/ /bshang ba gci ba khrag dang sha ni mchog tu ro mnyam skyugs pa'i dbus su rab tu zhugs pa ste/ /'di dag rnams ni ye shes bdud rtsi srid pa gsum gyi bla ma yis kyang rgyud rnams kun tu bstan/ 82 /shes rab chos 'byung la ni gang zhig lhung ba'i bde ba dag kyang rab tu 'bad pas bsrung bar bya/ /de yis sems can gang dag su zhig byung ba de ni rgyal ba'i rigs la byang chub sems dpa' nyid/ /de phyir de ni nyin zhag so so'i dus su bdud kyi pho nya srin po rnams kyis za ru 'jug /shes rab me tog dang ldan zos pa zhi ba

217
077-109a bde ba'i 'bras bu ster bar ston du 'jug par byed/ 83 /mchog gi bde ba la gnas rdo rje ma 'khums nyid kyi bar du chu skyes las ni dbyung mi bya/ /gang tshe 'dod pa grub pa de yi tshe na 'di ni sangs rgyas byin gyis brlabs par rab tu 'gyur/ /rdo rje chu skyes dag nas gzhug bya rang gi rdo rje'i snying gar ye shes 'khor lo rab bcug ste/ /'di yis 'od zer rnams kyis gnyi ga'i lus ni gang bar byas nas rnam pa thams cad pa nyid byed/ 84 /gal te 'di ni grub par ma gyur rdo rje nor bu la ni yang dag gnas pa bza' bar bya/ /shes rab kyi ni chos 'byung gnas la mtha' dag rgyal ba'i rigs ni bsrung ba'i don du dgod par bya/ /shes rab ldan pa la'o de nas gcig pu la ste slar yang gsung ni rab gsungs sangs rgyas sku/ /gang su 'di ni nyams la mngon par dga' byed g.yon can de ni rdo rje can gyis gsod par byed/ 85 /srid pa gsum gyi bdag pos drag po'i las kyi rang bzhin du ma'i sngags rnams rab tu gsungs pa gang / /de dag thams cad bdud kyi phyogs nyams 'jigs pa skyed byed srog chags rnams la nam yang ma yin no/ /gang zhig dran pa rnams kyi byed po g.yul gyi yul la dga' zhing gsod byed gzhan yang mu stegs pa/ /de rnams la ni mchog gi rgyal sras rnams kyis srog chags bsrung ba'i don du de dag sbyar bar bya/ 86 /mkha' 'gro rdo rje sngon rnams phyugs kyi skye bo gsod la sangs rgyas pa yis gsol ba gdab mi bya/ /sems can rnams ni bsrung ba'i don du srid pa gsum gyi bla mas 'jig rten khams su spros pa ste/ /de phyir de rnams nyin zhag so so'i dus su srung bar byed cing sgrub pa po la sdang bar byed/ /bsgrub bya dag ni las kyi mthu yis shi bar gyur na 'di ni sgrub pa po yi bdud yin no/ 87 /skyes bu rnams kyi sems ni kun nas mi dge'i 'bras bu'i dbang gis phran tshegs rig pa la rjes chags/ /rig pa 'di yis srid pa gsum po mtha' dag skad cig gis ni bdag gi dbang du byed pa'o/ /zhes pa'i bsam pa brkam chags sems kyi ye shes sbyin pa rnam par spangs nas dmyal bar rab tu 'jug /rgyab tu rdzas dang rang gi khyim thab gzhan gyi dbang 'gyur kye ma ngan pa'i chos la rab tu 'jug 88 /

218
077-109b shes rab ma yin thabs kyang min pa 'di ni lhan cig skyes pa'i sku ste chos kyi skur gyur pa/ /shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin nges par mun pa dang bral ye shes dang ni rnam shes dbye ba las/ /'di ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ste sgra brnyan lta bu sems can du ma'i don ni byed pa po/ /sems can rnams ni smin pa'i slad du slar yang 'di ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi sprul pa'i sku ru 'gyur/ 89 /rdo rje sems dpa' gcig pu 'di ni dus mtha'i sprin dang mtshungs pa he ru kar ni byung bar gyur/ /gdug pa rnams ni smin pa'i don te de yang dam tshig rgyal ba rmongs pa rnams ni bde ba'i don/ /rin chen dbang po sdug bsngal ldan pa rnams kyi de yang pad 'dzin chags can rnams kyi chags pa'i slad/ /bgegs rnams dag ni gzhom pa'i don du phyag gi pad+ma ral gri don yod grub par byung bar gyur/ 90 /zhe sdang las ni sna tshogs yum gang dus mtha'i rtse mo can mtshungs de ni mkha' 'gro mar byung gyur/ /gti mug dag las spyan ma zhes bya mchog gi snying rje mA ma kI ni nga rgyal rgyu las so/ /chags las de ni gos dkar zhes bya mtha' dag yon tan gter te sgrol ma yang ni phrag dog las/ /sna tshogs gzugs can gnyis po 'di dag g.yul dang yul can gzhan rnams thams cad du yang byung bar gyur/ 91 /phung po lnga yi rang bzhin rnams kyis rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga rnams la bzhugs pa brtse ba yis/ /nges pa rnam par ma bsgrubs bsod nams min pa bsags pa'i sems can rnams ni smin pa'i don du ste/ /gtsang ma'i gnas la sogs par bcom ldan gang zhig rnam par bzhugs pa nyan thos rnams kyi slad du'o/ /gang zhig e wa~M yi ge la gnas mchog gi nges pa can rnams mchog la dgod pa'i don du'o/ 92 /sems can rnams ni smin pa'i slad du sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dbye ba rnams kyis dus kun tu/ /nges par rdo rje can gyi bzhugs pa rnam gsum phyi dang nang dang gzhan du yang ni rab tu 'gyur/ /phyi rol sna tshogs phyogs su 'gyur te mchog gi lus la srog gi rlung ni rab tu rgyu ba'o/ /khyab bdag gi ni sa sogs dkyil 'khor dag la rab gyur gang de rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la/ 93 /sgra la sogs la

219
077-110a gang zhig rang sems 'gro ste yul med pa yang gzhan ni de bzhin kho na'o/ /gang zhig e wa~M yi ge la gnas mchog tu bde ba'i gnas la sku gsung thugs ni zhugs pa'o/ /gcig pu rdo rje can ni dbye ba gsum ste yul dang yul can khams rnams kyis kyang bskor ba'o/ /dus gsum gnas gsum du bzhugs srid pa gsum du'ang gnas pa sems can du ma'i don gyi slad du'o/ 94 /rgyud rnams dag las 'di skad bdag gis thos zhes gsungs pa gang de 'di ltar bdag gis shes pa ste/ /rdo rje can ni zla ba zhu las rdo rje gang zhig spyi mgrin snying ga'i chu skyes lte gsang dang / /bud med rnams kyi b+ha gar de ni thig le grol ba gsum gyis mchog gi pad+ma la gnas pa/ /de 'dir sangs rgyas zhing du rab tu zhugs pa bcom ldan 'das su rnal 'byor rnams kyis rig par bya/ 95 /skye ba snga mar rang gi snying gis bskyed pa'i zhi dang chags pa la sogs dngos po rnams kyi ni/ /bag chags stobs kyis 'khor lor gnas pa gcig ni du mar mthong ste smon lam yon tan dbang gis so/ /don gcig du ma'i skad ni rang rang dngos po rnams kyis srog chags rnams kyi snying la rab tu 'jug /gnas can rnams kyi bsod nams slad du 'khor lo la gnas bsod snyoms la ni rnam par rgyu ru gshegs/ 96 /dud 'gro yi dgas lha min rnams dang lto 'phye lha dang mi ni 'phags pa bod la sogs rnams la/ /byung dang 'byung 'gyur da ltar byung ba rnam pa gsum dang rtag tu bden pa'i chos ni gsung byed cing / / rang rang skad gzhan dag gis srid pa gsum po ma tshang med pa lam la yang dag 'god byed pa/ /'di ni bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i gsung ste lha yi skad kyang ma yin no/ 97 /sangs rgyas rnams kyi'ang rtogs bya min pa dpag med yon tan dang ldan sangs rgyas sprul pa sgyu ma ni/ /srid pa gsum gyi gnas su bdag nyid ston par byed de brgya byin gzhu ni ji bzhin nyid du'o/ /sna tshogs dngos rnams kyis phye rgyal ba dang bcas lha mi rnams kyi rang rang sems la rab zhugs pa/ /'di ni ma skyes chos te chu la nam mkha' bzhin du 'dir ni skye bar 'khrul pa ster ba'o/ 98 /

220
077-110b rgyal ba'i sku yi rdo rje yul dang yul can rnams kyi bgrod bya min pa rnam pa thams cad pa/ /gsung gi rdo rje sems can thams cad rang snying skad rnams dag gis chos ni go bar byed pa'o/ /rdo rje can gyi thugs kyi rdo rje sems can rnams kyi sems kyi rang bzhin mtha' dag sa la gnas/ / dri med nor bu lta bu dngos po rnams kyi 'dzin byed gang yin de nyid ye shes rdo rje'o/ 99 /sbyin pa la sogs bde mnyam 'bras ster drug dang bzhi rnams nus ma bcu po de dag rnams su gsungs/ /de dag rnams kyi thabs ni dag pa mchog gi rnam bcu sems kyis gang ba'i bum pa de dag rnams/ / bdud dang nyon mongs nyams pa 'dod pa zhes dang 'phrog byed rdo rje'i tshogs ni ljon pa la sogs rnams/ /phyag rgya drug rnams stong pa drug ste srid gsum skyed par byed pa ye shes rnam shes gcig pu'o/ 100 /'khor lo srid gsum kun nas dang ba zhes pa bde ba rin chen 'di yi chags pa nyid dag ni/ /pad+ma'o nyon mongs zad pa ral gri rdo rje dag kyang ye shes sku chen rnam par mi phyed pa'o/ /mi shes gcod pa gri gug mchog gi rigs drug rnams te 'di dag rnams kyis bskyed pa gang yin pa/ /phung po khams dang dbang po la sogs mkha' bzhin ro mnyam de dag rnams kyang de bzhin rig par bya/ 101 /gang du nges par rigs kyi gzugs ni nyams pa nyid du gyur pa de ni chen po'i gzugs su gsungs/ /gang du 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal nyams pa nyid du gyur pa de ni tshor ba chen por gsungs pa ste/ /gang du 'khor ba'i 'du shes nyams pa nyid du gyur pa de ni rdo rje'i 'du shes chen po'o/ /gang du 'khor ba 'phel ba nyams pa nyid du gyur pa dag ni rdo rje'i 'du byed kho na'o/ 102 /gang du gnyid la sogs pa'i gnas skabs nyams pa nyid du gyur pa de yang rnam par shes par gsungs/ /gang du shes pa min pa'i dngos po nyams pa nyid du gyur pa de ni thub pa'i ye shes nyid/ /'di dag rnam par snang mdzad la sogs mchog gi rgyal ba mchog ni rnam pa drug ste rigs drug rnams/ /gzhan gyi khams drug dbye ba rnams te sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha' zhi ba rnams/ 103 /gang du gti mug mtha' dag nyams pa

221
077-111a nyid du gyur pa spyan ma yin te de ni 'dzin ma'o/ /gang du nga rgyal mtha' dag nyams pa nyid du gyur pa mA ma kI ste de ni chu nyid do/ /gang du chags pa mtha' dag nyams pa nyid du gyur pa gos dkar mo ste de ni me yin no/ /gang du phrag dog mtha' dag nyams pa nyid du gyur pa sgrol ma yin te de ni rlung yang ngo / 104 /gang du zhe sdang mtha' dag nyams pa nyid du gyur pa rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma ste mkha'/ /gang du ser sna thams cad nyams pa nyid du gyur pa sna tshogs yum ste de ni 'gyur med do/ /mthong dang ma mthong gzugs ni yid dang nam mkha' la yang lta bar byed pa gang yin de ni mig /ring nas sgra ni rab tu gsal ba bzhin du thos pa 'di ni rgyal ba'i rna ba chen po'o/ 105 /mchog gi bde ba byed pa'i dri ni thams cad 'dzin pa de ni khyab bdag gi yang sna bzang po/ /rang gis zla ba'i bdud rtsi bde ster dag kyang rtag tu myang bar byed pa gang yin de ni lce/ /rdo rje'i reg bya kun nas 'phrog pa gang yin de ni rtag tu rdo rje lus kyi dbang po ste/ /thabs dang shes rab rab tu 'grogs las bde mnyam la 'jug yid gang yin pa de ni 'di yi chos/ 106 /dbye ba rug gis phye ba'i yul dang yul can 'di dag byang chub sems dpa' btsun mor bcas pa rnams/ /gzugs la gzugs la sogs pa 'di dag rgyal ba mchog gi yul rnams rnam pa drug ste kun nas ni/ /dang zhing ma skyes ma 'gags mchog gi bde byed gos pa med cing ye shes kyis ni rtogs bya ste/ /khams gsum dag tu gzhan gyis gzung bya dang ni mtha' dag 'gro ba'i dbang po'i sgo yis rtogs bya min/ 107 /ye shes dgug par byed pa 'dir ni slar yang shin tu stobs te de ni gzhug pa rmugs byed kyis/ /rengs byed de ni bcing ba nges par mchog gi bde ba'i dbang gis khengs byed kyis ni mnyes pa yang / /ye shes 'khor lo dag la 'khor lo ro ni mnyam par byed pa rdo rje shugs kyis byed pa ste/ /de bzhin khro bo'i lha mo rnams ni rab gsal nges par rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud kyi sku la'o/ 108 /srid pa gsum gyi gnas su bdud rnams dag la bsnun pa nges par dbyug pa sngon pos byed pa ste/ /bcing ba khro bo mi g.yo dus

222
077-111b mtha'i nyi ma dang mtshungs mtha' yas brtson 'grus kyis ni phur bus gdab/ /'dod pas de yis brtson 'grus nyams pas sa gzhi la gnas rengs par byed pa gnod mdzes nyid kyis so/ /gtsug tor gyis ni rdzu 'phrul nyams pa rab tu gsal zhing nges par sngar bzhin khro bo'i lha mo rnams/ 109 /yi dgas rnams ni smin pa'i don du de nas tsa rtsi kA la sogs pa spros par gyur pa ste/ /skye bo rnams ni bsrung ba'i don du dbang bo la sogs lha rnams de bzhin phyogs dang phyogs bral du/ /klu rnams smin par bya ba'i don du gdengs can rigs ni mtha' dag rdo rje can gyis nges par spros/ /lha min rnams ni smin par bya ba'i don du khyi yi gdong ma chen mo la sogs rnams kyang spros/ 110 /gzhan gang cung zad spros pa yod pa dag kyang khyab bdag dkyil 'khor la ni 'byung po las skyes mthar/ /sems can kun gyi don du mchog gi yon tan rnam mang 'di dag rang gi lus la rig par bya/ /de bzhin rgyud dang sngags ni rnam mang rigs la gnas rnams rnal 'byor ma dang rnal 'byor dbye ba ste/ /'di ni dbang bskur rnam pa gnyis kyang bu yi yon tan dbang gis 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'o/ 111 /gang zhig shes rab kyi ni nu ma la reg gzhan pa bdud rtsi myang dang 'khyud pa gang yin dang / /shes rab dang 'grogs byang chub sems ni zhu ba dag la bzhi pa'i skad cig bdud rtsi rtogs pa gang / /de dag thams cad nges par 'jig rten pa ste mchog gi snying rje yis ni lam gyi rgyu ru bstan/ /'jig rten 'das pa'i dbang gang mchog gi rgyal ba'i bdag po'i phyag rgya mchog la rjes su sbyor ba'o/ 112 /sems kyi snang ba tsam ste rang gi yid las skyes pa me long gi ni gzugs brnyan lta bu nyid/ /gang zhig mtha' dag rgyal ba'i sras dang sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsten pa rnal 'byor dbang pos bsten bya ste/ /ye shes me lce rab tu rgyas pa de ni bdud tshogs yul dang bcas pa mtha' dag sreg byed cing / /lus la chags pa la sogs kyang ste rnal 'byor rnams la lo yi sbyor bas bde mnyam ster bar byed/ 113 /shes rab ye shes dag ni sems dang de yi snang ba dag kyang rnam pa bcu po nyid du 'gyur/ /dbang

223
077-112a ni dri med ri bong can mtshungs me long gzugs brnyan lta bu 'di la zhugs pa gang yin pa/ /de las mya ngan 'das pa'i bde ba 'pho med lhan cig skyes pa 'gyur med nyid ni bzhi pa ste/ /sangs rgyas zhal 'di gang gi snying dang kha la gnas par gyur pa de ni dpal ldan bla ma'o/ 114 /nam mkhar kun nas zhen pa'i sems dang mig ni mi 'dzums rdo rje'i lam du rab tu zhugs pa yis/ /stong pa las ni du ba smig rgyu rab gsal dri ma med pa'i mkha' snang nyid dang mar me dang / /'bar ba dang ni zla ba nyi ma rdo rje rnams dang mchog gi cha dang thig le mthong bar 'gyur/ /de yi dbus su sangs rgyas gzugs ni yul dang rnam par bral ba du ma longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku/ 115 /nam mkha' chu 'dzin bral ba dag ni rnal 'byor pa yis bgrad pa'i mig gis blta bar bya ba ste/ /re khA nag po dri med 'od zer 'phro ba dus kyi rtsa la mthong bar gyur gyi bar du'o/ /de la kun mkhyen gzugs ni chu la nyi ma lta bu gos pa med pa kha dog sna tshogs te/ /rnam pa kun ldan rang sems yul dang rnam par bral ba dag go sems ni gzhan pa min pa nyid/ 116 /gzugs ni mthong bar gyur na nyin zhag so so'i dus su srog gi rlung ni 'gog par rab bya ste/ /'od zer 'khor lo rang gi lus la yongs su bskor cing 'khor bar byed pa mthong gi bar du'o/ /zla ba drug gi sdom brtson rnams kyi reg byas dman pa'i bde ba mnyam pa lam gyi sems su 'gyur/ /chags dang chags bral mtha' thog la gnas skad cig ma yang khyab bdag gi ni dbugs kyi grangs 'phel lo/ 117 /oT+DA 'bar ba'i bar dang khyad par dga' ba lhan skyes dag dang ye shes rnam shes dag gi dbus/ /gnyid dang gnyid yur mtshams su rdo rje pad+ma dag gi gnyis gnyis sbyor ba la ni bde ba gang / /de yi 'phel ba rab tu bya ste bla ma'i nges pa'i dbang gis 'phel 'gyur 'di la ngo mtshar med/ /nyon mongs bdud rnams bcom nas rgyal ba'i bdag por 'jug ste lo yi sbyor bas rnal 'byor bzang po'o/ 118 /sa yis rnam pa sra ba min zhing zhu ba chu lus khu ba min te gsher ba nyid min phyir/ /me yi rnam pa me min g.yo ba rlung gi lus ni gang zhig g.yo

224
077-112b ba min pas rlung ma yin/ /stong pa'i rnam pa yin yang blta bya dkar dang ljang dang kha dog sna tshogs chen po kha dog min/ /rnam pa thams cad pa yang blta bya min te rang snying dri ma nyon mongs bdud kyi mthu las so/ 119 /nA da thig le cha dang ye shes bdud rtsi'i gnas su son pa lu gu rgyud du bcings pa'i rtsa/ /srog dang thur sel lam gsum rnams te rdo rje dang bcas pad+ma rdo rje chu skyes ldan pa nyid/ /rlung gnyis yang dag phrad pa'i dbus su yul rnams yul can rnams ni 'byung dang rab tu 'jug pa ste/ /du ba la sogs rnams kyi mtshan ma 'dzin pa dag kyang gang zhig 'di dag thams cad gsang bar bya/ 120 /dbu mar srog ni rab gzhug nyi ma dang bcas ri bong can gyi bgrod pa g.yas dang g.yon la bcing / /phyag rgya rab tu 'grogs la sems dang mchog gi bde ba la gnas rdo rje yang dag bslang ba yang / /pad+mar rdo rje'i sgra'am rang gi lag pa'i chu skyes dag gis gsor ba bde ba'i slad du ste/ /sa bon gtong ba min pa'i bde ba de ni 'chi ba'i 'jigs 'phrog 'di ni dpal ldan bla ma'i zhal/ 121 /sa ni chu la rab tu 'jug cing chu yang 'bar byed la ste gtsang bar byed pa rlung la'o/ /rlung ni stong pa la ste stong pa nges par mtshan ma rnam pa bcu ru 'gyur zhing mtshan ma ni/ /rnam pa thams cad pa ru 'gyur te mi zad mchog gi bde ba gzhom du med pa ye shes sku/ /ye shes las ni rdzu 'phrul dngos grub tu 'gyur mi bdag skyes bu rnams kyi skye ba 'di nyid la'o/ 122 /'dod pa sprul pa'i skur ni nges par rab tu 'gyur te rdzogs pa dag ni de yi gsung nyid do/ /'bar ba sprul pa'i thugs te 'di yi mchog gi bde ba byed pa'i ye shes dag ni oT+TA nyid/ /dga' ba longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ste mchog dga' dang bcas khyad par dga' ba rim bas 'di yi ni/ /gsung dang thugs so lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba nyid kyang bde 'byung 'di yi ye shes rdo rjer 'gyur/ 123 /'dar ba nyid ni srid pa gsum gyis btud pa chos kyi sku ste 'byung ba de yi gsung du 'gyur/ /gnyid yur gnyid ni chos kyi thugs te gnyid ni 'di yi srid pa'i 'jigs 'joms ye shes kho na'o/ /yi ge nyid ni dag pa'i sku ste dbyangs

225
077-113a dang bral ba'i cha dang thig le nA da rim pa yis/ /bde 'byung dag pa'i sku yi gsung dang thugs dang ye shes rdo rje rnam gsum srid par gnas pa'o/ 124 /sad pa dang ni rmi lam rang bzhin slar yang gzhan pa 'di ni gnyid dang bzhi pa'i rang bzhin ni/ /lus la gnas dang dbugs la zhen pa yul rnams rnam par dpyod cing g.yo med sems la zhen pa ste/ /ye shes la gnas bud med rab tu 'grogs las byang chub sems ni zhu ba la yang skad cig 'gyur/ /sprul pa la sogs dag gi sems kyi rdo rje rnam pa bzhir ni rim pas nges par rab tu 'gyur/ 125 /de ltar sems ni rnam bzhi srid pa gsum la gnas pa'i srog chags rnams kyi thig le'i dbus su ste/ /rnal 'byor dbang po rnams kyi bde mnyam 'bras ster khyab byed dag ni thar pa'i slad du bsrung bar bya/ /thig le btang na rnal 'byor rnams kyi skye ba'i sa bon mchog gi bde ba song la thar pa gang / /de phyir 'khor ba'i bde ba'i skad cig 'dir ni sdom brtson rnams kyis thams cad dus su dor bar bya/ 126 /gang phyir a sogs ka sogs ri bong can dang nyin byed gcig nyid rdo rje can gyi gdan min zhing / /hU~M yig nyid kyis mtshan ma dang ni yongs su gyur pa gzhan pa kha dog gzugs dag mi 'dod de/ /'gyur med dag gis bskyed cing 'gyur ba nyams par gyur pa mchog gi dbang po dag dang ldan pa ni/ /rnam pa kun ldan thig le mtha' dag rgyal ba'i bdag po sna tshogs sgyu ma 'dzin pa 'di la'o/ 127 /l-i sogs dbyangs brgyad gang dag yul gyi yon tan du 'gyur dbyangs phyed kyis ni rnam par dman pa rnams/ /phan tshun dbye bas phye ba rkang pa dang bcas ro dang mda' rnams dbu ma'i dbugs ni 'bab pa ste/ /dus sbyor gnyis pa la ni yul gyi yon tan dbang gis ring po phan tshun dbye bas phye ba rnams/ /slar yang thun mtshams gsum pa la ni shin tu ring po yul gyi yon tan dbu ma'i dbugs rnams 'bab/ 128 /de ltar thun mtshams bzhi la mda' dang bcas pa'i ri bo ro rnams dbu ma yi ni dbugs kyi dbyangs/ /ka la sogs pa'i yi ge sum cu sum cu'i rab tu dbye bas rab tu gsal bar dgu brgya

226
077-113b nyid/ /dbyangs drug gi ni dbye bas phye ba mkha' mkha' dus dang mda' rnams dus sbyor gsum gyi rtsa gsum la/ /de bzhin ring pos rab tu phyi rnams phyi ma'i nyin mo'i bgrod par dus sbyor gsum gyi rtsa gsum la/ 129 /slar yang dbyangs drug dag gis phye ba rnams ni mtshan mo'i dus su dus sbyor gsum gyi rtsa gsum la/ /de bzhin ring pos rab tu phye rnams phyi ma'i mtshan mo'i bgrod par dus sbyor gsum gyi rtsa gsum la/ /nyin zhag so so'i dus su dbugs ni 'byung dang 'jug pa mkha' mkha' drug dang zla ba mig rnams 'bab/ /snga ma stong pa rnams bsdus nas ni mnyam dang mi mnyam bgrod par dbu ma dag la sbyar bar bya/ 130 /phyi rol du ni gang zhig chu tshod brgyad pa'i phyed gyur sgra gcan longs spyod dag las gzhan du gnas/ /de ni rang gi lus la dbugs phyed nges par mun pa dang bral 'jig rten thams cad snang ba ste/ /snga ma phyed ni mun pa dang bcas srid pa gsum po mtha' dag stong pa dag tu thim pa'o/ /de phyir de ni phug nas dus kyi 'khor lo rnal 'byor ldan pa gcig pu mun pa bral bar 'jug 131 /zla ba dman zhing nyi mar lhag gang khyab bdag mchog gi cha de 'dir ni thun mtshams bzhi la ste/ /thun dang thun la nyin dang mtshan mo'i dbang gis bgrod cing dus sbyor phyed pa'i rab tu dbye ba yis/ /sum cu rtsa drug dus kyi pho nya nyis 'gyur mi bdag gzhan rnams tshes ni brgyad gnyis dbye ba la/ /gza' rnams kyi yang brgyad kyi dbye ba la ste slar yang gzhan rnams du ma tshigs kyi tshogs la'o/ 132 /rig byed dus kyi dbugs kyi lhag ma srid gsum skyed par mdzad ma mkha' 'gro ma ni sna tshogs gzugs/ /zla ba'i dbus su dman pa gang de mchog gi rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rang gi phyag rgya rnam gnyis 'gyur/ /gang zhig nyi ma la gnas de ni brgyad dbye phyogs dang phyogs bral 'dab mar thun tshod longs spyod mtha'/ /lhag ma 'khor lo'i lha mo mchog tu 'jigs par byed pa gzhan rnams mtha' dag phyi dang lus la'o/ 133 /spen par bug pa mun can nyin zhag ces bya lha yi bla ma'i phyed bcas

227
077-114a mig dang mig gi grangs/ /phyed bcas drug dang rig byed du 'gyur de rnams mchog gi rgyal ba'i bdag po'i thugs rdo rje las skyes/ /sa skyes stong pa sbrul zla nyi ma gza' lag pa sangs mjug rings la yang stong pa sbrul mkha' gcig /mkha' mig mig dang gcig tu gyur pa de rnams mchog gi khyab bdag gi ni dag pa'i gsung las byung / 134 /gang zhig zla ba'i dus kyi longs spyod mkha' mkha' ro me de rnams sku yi rdo rje dag las byung / /mtha' dag gcig tu gyur pa ro drug sbrul dang dus rnams dag ste phyed kyi chu tshod de bzhin nyid/ / mkha' 'gro dus kyi gzugs can mtha' dag lus la gnas shing srog chags rnams kyi srog ni 'phrog byed ma/ /de phyir nyin zhag so so'i dus su rang gi lam ni dgag par byas nas de rnams bsgrub par bya/ 135 /ji srid gza' rnams dag gi longs spyod rang gzhan bgrod pa la gnas dbugs rngub dbugs 'byung rgyu ba las/ /de srid dus kyi pho nya khyab byed ma gang khams gsum du ni mchog dag ster bar 'gyur ram ci/ /pho nya phra mo rab tu rgyu ba bla ma'i gsung la gnas pa byang chub sems dang 'gyur med la/ /sdig bral rnal 'byor ldan pa rnams kyis shes par bya ste gzhan du 'dod chags sems kyi ma yin no/ 136 /nyi ma dang ni zla ba'i rkang pa rnams la gnyi ga'i bgrod pa'i dbang gis sred pas bsnun pa rnams/ /yan lag rnams kyis bgos pa'o lhag ma'i rkang pa de ni sgra gcan 'jug pa la yang mjug rings za/ / thun mtshams kun dang thun brgyad nyin zhag so so'i dus su srog chags rnams kyi yan lag bcu gnyis rnams/ /dus sbyor re re la ni dbugs rnams dag kyang nyis 'gyur dgu brgya'i srog rnams 'bab par yan lag gsungs/ 137 /yan lag gnyis gnyis rnams la thog ma'i nyin zhag dbang gis dang po ma rig yan lag bcu gnyis par/ /de phyir dus la sogs pas yan lag rnams te gzhan ni dgu pa sngar gzhan gang yin de rnams so/ /de ltar rnam pa lnga po rnams kyis dus su yang ni kun nas zla ba gnyis gnyis dag las 'gyur/ /gang

228
077-114b du zla ba'i cha gcig nyams pa nyid du gyur pa dang po'i zla ba de nyid kho na'o/ 138 /zla ba drug dang dus gsum gyis ni 'dzin par 'gyur te rten cing 'brel pa yan lag bcu gnyis kyis/ /drug pa nyi ma'i dus kyi dbye ba rkang pa'i bgrod pa'i dbang gis zla ba'i dbus su rab tu zhugs/ /reg pa'i yan lag dbus der sgra gcan gyis ni zla ba nyi ma dag gi rkang pa de 'dzin no/ /nyin dang mtshan mo'i dus su sgra gcan dag gis bltas pa'i sman rnams gang yin de dag grub pa ster/ 139 /sa skyes khu ba gza' lag zla ba nyi ma gza' lag pa sangs sa skyes sngags pa nyi skyes spen/ /sngags pa lug la sogs pa'i khyim la nyin zhag so so'i dus su zhing can rnams te dus kun tu/ /zhi la zla nyi'i khyim ste gza' lag pa sangs sa skyes sngags pa nyi skyes khyim ni rgyas pa dang / /dbang dang dgug pa 'bral dang gsad pa dag la rab 'gyur gal te 'dir ni zhing can gyur na'o/ 140 /zhi la dkar po'i zhal te dang por rgyas pa la ni dkar dang ser mtshungs thun tshod lag pa las/ /rengs pa ser po me yi thun la'o rmongs la gser dang nyi mtshungs chu gter la ste dgug pa la/ /dmar po lnga pa dag las 'gyur te dbang la nyi ma chu gter dang mtshungs drug pa'i thun la'o/ /gsad la nag po'i zhal te ri bo la'o bskrad la gnag dang dkar 'dir sbrul la mtshan mo'i mthar/ 141 /sa chu me rlung ri bong can dang nyi ma lha ste 'di rnams srog ni longs spyod byed po min/ /'di rnams srog ni longs spyod po yang mi dge 'bras bu'i dbang gis bdag ni longs spyod sems par byed/ /sred pa sdug bsngal rjes chags 'byung po'i tshogs ni gza' dang lag 'gro lha rnams dag la don gnyer byed/ /gang gi drin gyis thar par rab tu 'gyur ba yid kyis zhi ba de ni byed pa ma yin no/ 142 /dang po'i dbugs ni yon tan med pa'i bdag nyid rnam gsum yon tan dbang gis de yang gsum grangs 'gyur/ /de yang yul gyi yon tan dbang gis tshes zhes bya bar 'gyur te de rnams slar yang sum 'gyur ni/ /'byung ba chu gter grangs

229
077-115a 'gyur slar yang de nas rgyu ba'i dbye ba rnams kyis bsnun pa de dag rnams/ /chu tshod phyed kyi dbugs kyi grangs rnams dag ste slar yang nyis 'gyur chu tshod dbugs kyi grangs rnams so/ 143 /gnyis gsum chu gter mda' dus ri brgyad gza' dang bcu rnams kyis ni dus kyi rtsa 'di 'phel ba ste/ /de nas sde yi rab dbye rnams kyis rnam gnyis lam la gnas pa dus kyi rtsa ni 'jig rten gsum/ /kun nas gang bar byed do bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba zla ba nyi ma'i rab tu rgyu ba las/ /ji srid rig byed sbrul dang me ste nges par phyag na gri gug thod pa can du rab tu 'gyur/ 144 /'khor lo mda' dang chu gter grangs ni yul dang yon tan dbang gis sku gsung thugs kyi rab dbye yis/ /gtso bo srung bar byed de bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba du ba la sogs lha mo brgyad rnams so/ /de ltar nyi ma la gnas gtso bo mchog gi ri bong can gyi cha yis 'khyud pa sna tshogs gzugs/ /lha mo sangs rgyas 'chi med rnams dang yul dang yul can sgra gcan zla ba nyi mas phyag 'os pa'o/ 145 /gtso bo yi ni phra mo'i ngo bo mchog gi yon tan yul te nang dang phyi rol phyag rgya gang / /de rnams khams gsum du ni mchog tu 'jigs byed khro bo'i sems las rab skyes mkha' 'gro ma rnams so/ /gtso bo'i dbang po gang dag rnams dang rnam gsum srid pa la gnas sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ste/ /de rnams rang gi yul bcas yon tan gyis 'khyud bkra shis la sogs rdo rje mkha' 'gro 'di rnams so/ 146 /gzugs dang sgra dang ro dang dri dang gzhan pa dag kyang de nas reg bya du ba rdul dang ni/ /snying stobs sems la rim pas rab tu gsal bar yang ni de bzhin sgra gcan gyis kyang 'khyud pa ste/ /de dag rnams kyi dal rkang drug dang myur 'khyog la sogs rgyu ba las ni rnam mang bgrod pa 'di/ /brgyad po rnams kyi rkang pa drug la yul dang yon tan brgyad rnams yang dag gnas pa 'khor lo'i tshul/ 147 /dang po'i dbugs ni dbye ba brgyad de yul dang yon tan la gnas kun nas du ba la sogs pa/ /mkha' 'gro

230
077-115b ma rnams dag gis bskor zhing rnam gsum bgrod pa'i dbang gis 'khyam ste 'gro ba drug tu gnas/ /de yi dbus su dus kyi 'khor lo bdud rtsi 'phro ba'i cha yis 'khyud par gyur pa dag pa'i sku/ /gang zhig dbugs ni bcad nas rgyal ba'i sku la 'jug pa de nyid kho na dus kyi 'khor lo'o/ 148 /dbugs ni bcad pa'i mtha' ru rnam gsum bgrod pa 'di dang rnam pa drug kyang yod pa ma yin te/ /thig le bkab par gyur na kun nas mchog gi khyab bdag bde ba mtha' yas dus su 'jug par 'gyur/ /'khor ba dag gi bde ba spangs nas mchog gi bla ma'i zhal ni rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya/ /spyod pa sgeg pa'i gzugs dang mchog tu 'jigs pa byed la rnal 'byor ma rnams dgyes pa ma yin no/ 149 /gtso bo'i dbugs la gza' yi tshogs kyi rkang pa mtha' dag dus kyi sbyor ba dag gis thim 'gyur te/ /dbugs ni mkha' mkha' nam mkha' mkha' mig me dang chu gter song na thams cad stong par skul bar byed/ /lo 'di rnams kyis phyi rol du ni mchog gi khyab bdag rkang pa spro dang sdud pa'i ngo bo la/ /rang rang tshad kyis rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rkang pa dbugs kyi dbus su 'gro dang gnas pa shes par bya/ 150 /stong pa la ni spen pa 'jug pa rang gi nyin zhag bgrod pa'i dbang gis dus kyi mthar 'gyur te/ /stong pa nam mkha' mkha' mtsho chu gter zla ba'i nyin zhag longs spyod lhag ma rnams kyis nam gru'o/ /rang gi bgrod pa 'gro ba'i nyin zhag mkha' mkha' nam mkha' mkha' mtsho mig gis der ni sgra gcan 'jug /rang gi bgrod par 'gro ba'i nyin zhag mkha' mkha' nam mkha' mkha' dus dus kyi lha yi blon po 'jug 151 /nam mkha' mkha' dang stong pa mkha' brgyad sbrul dang mig gi nyin zhag rnams kyis bkra shis 'jug pa ste/ /mkha' mkha' nam mkha' mkha' mig me dang chu gter grangs kyi nyin zhag rnams kyis nyi ma la sogs 'jug /mkha' mkha' nam mkha' mkha' mtsho brgyad dang zla ba mda' yi nyin zhag rnams kyis zla ba der

231
077-116a 'jug ste/ /de yi dus su rgyal po'i 'gro ba dag ni rang rang tshad kyis rnam par nyams par rab tu 'gyur/ 152 /de nas zla ba nyi ma shar ba la yang rtsa yi kun tu spyod pa 'di ni rab tu 'gyur/ /gcig gnyis gsum dang chu gter mda' dang ro dang ri bo nor rnams 'phel bar gyur pa gsang ba'i rtsa/ /bug pa zhes bya sgo yi rtsar 'gyur bcu pa phra mo'i rtsa ni slar yang steng gi lam du'o/ /de ni sde yis phye ba yon tan dang bcas yul dang bcas pa 'khor lo'i rtsa rnams dag tu 'gyur/ 153 /gtsug tor snying ga'i phyogs dang mgo bo ri bong can gnas mgrin pa'i phyogs te nyi ma'i rgyu ba dang / /lte bar 'khor lo'i rtsa ni dus dang lag 'gro mi bdag sum cu rtsa gnyis de yi nyis 'gyur rnams/ /zla ba'i rkang pa rnams kyis tha dad ma yin mtha' dag nyi rkang bsres pa yis kyang tha mi dad/ /brgya dang brgyad cu rtsa gcig gang zhig lag rkang la gnas tshigs kyi rtsa ni gnyis kyi dbye ba rnams/ 154 /gtsug tor snying ga'i phyogs dang ri bong can dang nyi ma'i rkang pa mgrin pa'i 'khor lor lhag ma rnams/ /brgyad cu rtsa gcig mtha' ma rab gsal rnam bcu gang yin de dag zhi dang drag po'i gza' rnams te/ /de dag rnams kyi thog mtha'i cha ni khyab bdag zhabs la gnas pa dus kyi rtsa yis longs spyod cing / /gza' yi mtha' yang srid pa gsum gyi skyed ma rdo rje sku yi mkha' 'gro ma yis longs spyod do/ 155 /dang por gang zhig stong pa'i ngo bo yul dang yon tan la gnas de yi rang bzhin dag tu 'gyur/ /khams dang phung po rnams la rab zhugs slar yang mig la sogs pa'i dbang po rnams la mnyam pa ste/ /sad dang rmi lam la sogs la zhugs mchog gi bde mnyam gzhom du med par yang dag rab zhugs pa/ /rig ma sangs rgyas yum de rdo rje yi ni tshigs la gnas pa rnal 'byor pa yis btsal bar bya/ 156 /gtso bo'i sku yi mthu las rnal 'byor pa rnams dag gi mchog gi lus la lha yi spyan du 'gyur/ /de yi gsung gi mthu las rna ba de yi thugs las gzhan gyi snying la gnas pa

232
077-116b shes par 'gyur/ /shes rab sku yi mthu las rnam gsum srid pa la gnas sngon gyi skye ba rjes su dran par 'gyur/ /shes rab kyi ni gsung gi mthu las mkha' mnyam thams cad dus su kun 'gro'i rdzu 'phrul du rab 'gyur/ 157 /shes rab ye shes rang bzhin las ni gang zhig bde mnyam thams cad dus su gzhom du med par 'gyur/ /lha yi spyan gyi mthu las mig gis ma mthong ba dang srid pa rnam pa gsum yang mthong bar 'gyur/ /lha yi rna ba dag gi mthu las srog chags kyis brjod snying dang kha yi sgra ni thos par 'gyur/ /de bzhin sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba dag las mi yi bdag po reg bya la sogs thams cad 'gyur/ 158 /rtsa ni gang zhig thur sel dbus su rnam gsum lam gnas gci ba bshang ba khu ba 'bab pa rnams/ /srog ni de dag rnams kyi rab tu rgyu ba rnam pa dgu ru 'gyur te mtha' ma sangs rgyas zhal/ /rna ba sna dang mig la rnam gnyis shes par 'gyur te lce'u chung ni lce dang bcas pa dang / /thig le gtsug tor bug par 'gyur te bcu pa shes pa min pa rnams la rgya yis btab pa gang / 159 /srog dang thur sel 'gags par gyur na ri bong 'dzin pa bskyod pa nyi ma'i gzugs su rab tu 'gyur/ /rdo rje pad+mas rab tu sad na slar yang 'di ni nyi ma'i gzugs kyi me lces zhu bar byed/ /rlung dang zla ba nyi ma 'gags par gyur na rnam par shes pa dang ni ye shes gcig tu 'gyur/ /de ltar de ltar dang ni de bzhin de ltar rnam gsum du 'gyur gzhan ni cung zad yod ma yin/ /zla ba nyi ma'i gzugs ni zos na mkha' la nyin mo dang ni mtshan mo nam yang min pa nyid/ /thun mtshams de ni lus kyi dbus su rnal 'byor rnams kyi dus kun bdud rtsi'i go 'phang la gnas pa'o/ /phyogs zad zla ba mkha' la gnas pa nyi ma'i gzugs la ro ni mnyam par 'gyur ba ji lta bar/ /srog dang thur sel zad par gyur na gsal bar yang ni lus la dngos grub dus su de 'gag go/ 161 /zla ba nyi ma'i rgyu ba nyams shing lam ni gnyi ga yi yang srog gi rlung ni chen po

233
077-117a 'gag/ chu skyes rdo rje rab tu sad cing ri bong can zhu nyi ma'i gzugs chen la ni rab tu zhugs/ /dngos dang dngos med gcig gyur rnam gsum srid pa la gnas gzhom med legs par rab tu rtogs gyur pa/ /de yi dus su rnal 'byor pa ste gang la gnyis ni cung zad med pa mchog gi go 'phang 'gro/ 162 /khro bo sangs rgyas lha mo dang bcas nges par ro yi rdo rje rnams dang sa yi snying po sogs/ /rab tu dga' ba'i thugs rnams rnal 'byor pa la grub pa'i dus su nam mkha' la ni mngon sum 'gyur/ /de yi 'dod pa'i dngos grub ri bong can gyi zhag gi tho rangs dang ni mtshan mo phyed la 'gyur/ /rin po che'am me tog char ni mchog gyur dus kyis sbyor bas sa yi steng du 'bab par 'gyur/ 163 /lus ni dang zhing rdul phran nyams pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs mtshan la sogs pa rnams kyis rab rdzogs 'gyur/ /sna tshogs 'jig rten gsum po nyid ni dang zhing sgrib pa rnam par bral ba rmi lam bzhin du snang / /skad ni kun nas chad pa med cing du ma'i skad gzhan dag gis gzhan gyi snying la 'jug pa ste/ /sems ni dam pa'i bde bas gang zhig mi g.yo thams cad dus su lhan cig skyes pas 'khyud pa'o/ 164 /sa las chu dang rtse mo can dang rlung gi rdul phran phye nas chu yi khams la 'jug par byed/ /chu las sa me rlung phye rtse mo can la rtse mo can las sa dang chu dang rlung phye ste/ /rlung la'o rlung las sa dang chu dang rtse mo can dag phye nas las kyi rlung yang stong pa la/ /rnam gsum srid pa'i dbang gis gang zhig las kyi rlung gis bsnun pa gzhan rnams zhing gzhan dag tu 'gro/ 165 /sangs rgyas zhing ni ma lus las can min par srid gsum skyed par mdzad pas rnam par gzigs nas ni/ /gnyi ga ro mnyam dag pa'i rdul la sangs rgyas thams cad byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bskor ba ste/ /so so re re'i ro yi rdul la gnyi ga'i rigs kyi dbang gis rdo rje'i sras po rnams kyis bskor/ /sa la sogs pa'i rdul la ma lus rigs la gnas pa mtha' yas mi g.yo sogs la rab

234
077-117b zhugs rnams/ 166 /de dag rnams dang thabs cig rdo rje sems dpa' 'chags pa'i dus kyi bar du mkha' la rnam par bzhugs/ /yang dag 'dzin par byed pas sa dang chu dang bsreg za rlung dang stong pa'i rang bzhin rdul phran 'dzin/ /srub par byed pas tha dad rdul phran mtha' dag gcig tu gyur gyi bar du srub par byed pa ste/ /slar yang de dag rnams ni phan tshun sbyor bar 'gyur te gtso bo'i dngos la chung ngu'i dngos rnams so/ 167 /dbyibs kyi rlung ni chen po thams cad dag gis sangs rgyas zhing rnams mtha' dag rnam par 'god par byed/ / 'jig rten khams ni so so dag la slar yang khor yug ri bo chen po dag ni kun nas so/ /de yi dbus su las kyi sa ni chen po dag gi rang bzhin 'jig rten khams su rab tu 'gyur/ /lhag ma longs spyod rang bzhin yul gyi bde ba byed pa rin chen kun gyis rab tu gang ba rnams/ 168 /mtha' dag ri yi bdag po'i shar ni dag pa'i in+d+ra nI la lho ni pad+ma rA ga ste/ /nub ni ka ta na ser po byang ni ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar zla ba chu shel lo/ /dbus ni ljang gu de yi snying por de yi nang du chud pa 'dir ni dkyil 'khor chen po ste/ /dang por thugs kyi rang bzhin de nas dbus ma las ni nyis 'gyur dag kyang gsung gi rang bzhin no/ 169 /de nas gzhan ni nyis 'gyur dag ste mda' la bcu yis bsgyur bar gyur pa'i dpag tshad stong phrag go/ /de yi phyi rol dus rnams dag gis 'khor lo'i ngo bo de nas 'jig rten khams kyi rang bzhin no/ /'khor lo drug dang rigs drug gis te rig byed 'bum gyis rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas dkyil 'khor ro/ /brgyad gnyis ka ba mi bdag ri bong can gyi cha yis khang pa brtsegs pa zlum po skye gnas gzugs/ 170 /rgyal ba'i bdag po'i gtsug tor nas ni mdzod spu'i dbus su phyed dang bcas pa nyi ma'i sor du 'gyur/ /de nas mgrin pa'i chu skyes de bzhin snying ga dang ni de nas lte gsang chu skyes de bzhin no/ /zhabs kyi 'og dang rje ngar brla dang dpyi yang ma nu de nyid de nyid rig byed rnams kyis te/ /brang phyed phyed bcas nyi

235
077-118a mas rang dpung dpung lag rnams ni mkha' mig rgyal po nyi ma'i tshad kyis so/ 171 /nyi shu 'ga' zhig lhag pa'i brgya phrag gang zhig dus dang dgu yis mi rnams kyi ni 'jig rten tshad/ /rig byed phyed dang bcas pa'i bzhi dang chu gter chu gter phyed dang bcas pa'i rig byed rig byed kyis/ /gtsug tor mgo bo 'og tu 'gyur te rgyal ba'i bdag po'i dpal ldan dpral ba dag dang shangs dang ni/ /shangs kyi 'og tu ko sko'i mtha' dang de nas mgrin pa dag ste mgrin pa'i rtsa ba'i chu skyes dbus/ 172 /de nas snying ga lte ba gsang bar mi yi bdag po phyed bcas nyi ma rnams kyis rim pas 'gyur/ /gsang ba'i chu skyes lte ba'i rtsa bar rdo rje dag kyang thub pa yis ni steng gi gtsug tor nyid/ /mdzod spu gsang ba'i chu skyes dbus su khu ba'i thig le mi 'gyur bde ba skyed byed gnas pa gang / /dpal ldan rdo rje'i sa 'di gnyi ga'i rigs kyi dbang gis sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo dag la'o/ 173 /phyed bcas nyi ma nyi shu rtsa lnga de las nyis 'gyur dag kyang thugs gsung sku yi 'khor lo ste/ /thugs kyi phyed ni sor drug rkang pa dang bcas snying ga la gnas lhan skyes ye shes 'khor lo'o/ /gsum po dag las sgo rnams bya ste nor bu'i rang bzhin gyis spras dkyil 'khor rnams las brgyad cha'o/ /'gro dang 'ong bas steng dang 'og tu sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi 'khor lo nyis 'gyur dag tu 'gyur/ 174 /lhun por gnas pa la yang rgyal ba'i bdag po'i sor mo phyed ni dpag tshad stong phrag dag tu 'gyur/ /de bzhin lha yi ri bo dag ni lus kyi tshad du 'gyur te rgyar ni phyed kyi tshad yin no/ /de yi steng du rdo rje'i rnam pa brtsegs pa cha gsum pa ste de yi yang ni phyed du 'gyur/ /de bzhin 'og tu 'dzin ma chu dang me dang rlung dang me lce dang bcas rdo rje phreng ba'o/ 175 / phyed bcas nyi mas rgyal ba'i bdag po'i thugs kyi 'khor lor 'gyur te lte ba mgrin pa'i chu skyes dbus/ /gsung gi 'khor lo sku yi 'khor lo rdo rje nor bu'i gnas nas steng du mdzod spu phyed kyi mtshams/ /sgo khyud mthar ni dpal ldan 'gram par 'gyur te mi bdag dpral ba'i

236
077-118b steng du gtsug tor dag gi mtshams/ /phyed bcas nyi ma rnams kyis sa chu me rlung dkyil 'khor me lce dang bcas rdo rje phreng ba'o/ 176 /steng dang 'og tu sangs rgyas sku 'di mnyam par 'gyur te sku dang gsungs dang thugs kyi 'khor lo'o/ /kun nas rlung gis bgrod pa'i dbang gis thad ka'i tshad kyis gsum rnams kyis sam de bzhin drug rnams kyis/ /rtsibs brgyad mtshan ma dang ni rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rkang pa dang bcas sor mo drug gis 'khor lor 'gyur/ /sgo brgyad rnams kyis bskor zhing rang gi lag mthil sen mo rnams kyis dpal ldan dur khrod brtag par bya/ 177 /steng 'og zhal dang gsang bar gnyis dang chu gter tshad kyis bcom ldan 'das ma'i dkyil 'khor dag tu 'gyur/ /pad+ma phyed la snying po'i dbus nas gsum rnams kyis kyang de nas phreng ba dang bcas 'khor lo drug /sgo la sogs pa dag dang 'gram par 'khor lo kun nas lnga cha dag gis nges par rab tu 'gyur/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i sku ni mchod rten gzugs 'di kun nas shes rab ma yin thabs kyang ma yin no/ 178 /lhun po'i phyi rol du ni 'og gi sa gzhi'i gnas la dngos grub brgyad po yang dag gnas pa ste/ /shar du ral grir 'gyur te ro yi dbang po bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu ril bu mig sman ro tsa na/ /lho ru dpal ldan rkang mgyogs mi zad mtha' dag gter ni dkyil 'khor dag gi me yi zur du'o/ /dbus su mchod phyir thogs pa dag ste lha dang mi yi bla ma'i tshangs pa'i dbyangs ni de nyid do/ 179 /nor bu gtsug tor dpral ba mgrin pa snying ga'i gnas dang lte ba gsang ba la yang rdo rje ni/ /gcig gnyis chu gter mda' dang klu yi dbang po dgu bcas nyin byed sor rnams dag gis rim pas so/ /dbus dang steng 'og gsum gyi cha ste zum pa dang ni rnam par gyes pa zhi dang drag po la/ /dril bu dag kyang de bzhin cha gsum steng ni rdo rje dang mtshungs ba lang kha dang pad+ma'i gzugs/ 180 /khyon ni de yi sum cha zhal dang bcas pa'i lte ba 'dab ma dag kyang de yi sum cha las/ /rwa ni khyon dang mtshungs pa phyogs dang phyogs bral du

237
077-119a ste rwa yi zlum po dag ni bzhi cha'o/ /phyi rol rwa yi sum cha 'og ste steng du ba da rI yi tsher ma'i rnam pa sbyor ba'o/ /dril bu'i zhal rnams de bzhin 'dab ma rdo rje yang ngo ba lang kha la sogs pa de bzhin nyid/ 181 /gsang ba'i chu skyes mdzod spu'i mtha' yi cha yis mchog gi rgyal ba'i bdag po'i mchod rten dpangs kyi tshad/ /de yi phyed kyis gdan gyi rgya ste sa bzhin shin tu nyams pa de yi sum chas phyogs cha rnams/ /phyed dang gnyis mthar phyir byung chu skyes snying gar son pa'i dkyil 'khor gdan gyi tshad kyis zlum po'o/ /pad+ma'i mtha' las cha dman gzhi dang mnyam pa brang ste de yi phyogs cha yis kyang mgrin pa'o/ 182 /gdan gyi phyed kyi cha yis gdong ste sa bzhin shin tu mnyam pa de yi sum chas phyogs cha rnams/ /gsang ba'i chu skyes dag las phyed bcas nyi mas dpangs su shin tu mnyam pa'i gdan gyi tshad 'gyur te/ /gdan nas pad+ma'i mngon mtshams snying gar son pa'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dang de nas mgrin pa'i rtsa ba'o/ /de nas gdong gi mthar ni de bzhin chu gter dus dang phyed bcas rig byed rnams kyis dum bu gsum/ 183 /gdan las rig byed dag gis pad+ma snying gar son pa'i dkyil 'khor mgrin pa'i tshad kyang de bzhin te/ /phyed bcas brgyad kyis gdong pa'i tshad dang de yi steng du gdugs kyi phreng bar 'gyur ro mi yi dbang / /mdzod spu'i mtshams nas dpral ba dag dang mgo bo de nas 'dir ni gtsug tor dag gi mthar thug 'di/ /de ltar nges par 'jig rten khams ni mtha' dag rgyal ba'i sku ste 'khor lo mchod rten rang bzhin no/ 184 /gser ni sa yi khams su 'gyur te dngul ni chu dang zangs ma dag kyang me yi khams yin no/ /lcags ni rlung ste zha nye dkar nag 'di ni stong pa dag dang 'dres pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin no/ /rin chen ser po sa ru 'gyur zhing dkar po chu dang rin chen dmar po yang ni me yin te/ /nag po rlung ngo sngon po dang ni ljang gu de yang de bzhin 'dres pa'i khams las byung ba'o/ 185 /lan tshwa sa dang mngar ba chu ru rab tu 'gyur zhing tsha ba me dang kha ba rlung yin te/ /skyur dang

238
077-119b bska ba'i ro ni 'dres pa dag go slar yang zhing gi rngo rnams dag gi skye gnas dang / /sman rnams rnam pa drug gi ro dang mchog gi ro ste khams rnams gzhan pa nor bu'i dbang po rnams/ /sa la sna tshogs reg pa rnams dang mtha' dag nad ni 'phrog pa nyid kyi chu rnams yang dag go/ 186 /sa yis zug gzer 'phrog par byed cing dug kyang chu yi khams kyis 'phrog par byed de me yis ni/ /'byung po rlung gis rengs pa nam mkha' yis kyang gdug pa'i lta ba rab tu lhung ba 'phrog par byed/ /ye shes kyis ni thams cad 'phrog ste de bzhin mi bdag rnams kyi lus la gnas pa'i nor bus kyang / /chu dang ro dang nor bu reg pa sngags dang sman rnams dag gi mthu rnams thams cad bsam mi khyab/ 187 /bcom ldan ye shes 'khor lo'i rang bzhin can ni kun nas sangs rgyas zhing du rab tu 'jug 'gyur zhing / /slar yang thams cad tshogs pa'i sbyor ba dag las 'bras bu'i dbang gis sems can rab tu 'jug par 'gyur/ /rang gi nyin bgrod dbang gis yan lag bcu gnyis de dag rnams kyis zla ba lhun po rdzogs pa 'dir/ /mchod rten rnam pa steng du brtsegs pa rdo rje'i rang bzhin mi bdag de yi snying po'i dkyil 'khor ro/ 188 /phyi rol du ni rgyu skar 'khor lo rnams te las kyi sa la sa gzhi la gnas mi rnams so/ /longs spyod sa la gling drug bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu'i ro yi kha zas can gzhan lha la sogs pa rnams/ /rwa la rjes su gnas pa brgyad rnams lha yi bdag po me dang dus dang lha min chu gter rlung / /gnod sbyin dang ni drag po 'og dang steng du 'khor dang bcas pa khyab 'jug nyid dang chu gter gdong / 189 /'dir ni chu srin rnam shes dang ni stong pa'i khams te bum pa dag ni 'du byed nyid dang rlung / /nya dang lug dang glang dang 'khrig pa tshor ba me ru rab tu 'gyur te 'du shes chu dang ni/ /gzugs dang sa dang 'gyur med dag dang lhan cig skyes pa karka Ta la sogs pa'i khyim rnams so/ /'di rnams mtshan ma rdo rje la sogs ka tsa Ta pa ta sa ring po thung ngu lhag pa'i lha/ 190 /lug dang 'khrig pa

239
077-120a karka Tar ni zla ba dkar po nyi ma seng ge bu mo srang rnams so/ /sa skyes sngags pa sgra gcan rnams te gza' lag spen pa gdengs can sdig pa gzhu yi thog mthar ro/ /de ltar sa la sogs pa'i khams ni kun nas phan tshun sbyor bar 'gyur ro mi yi bdag po kye/ /'gro ba 'di ni sems can rnams kyi las kyi rang bzhin du 'gyur rin chen kun gyis rab tu gang / 191 /gang dag sa la dpag bsam shing dang ro dang mchog gi ro dang sman dang ro yi dbang po gzhan/ /mtha' dag nad 'phrog rdul phran rnams kyis rab tu bskyed pa de rnams sems can rnams kyis mi mthong ste/ /gang zhig phal pa'i rtsa dang shing dang chu dang rdul dang rdo ba dang ni lcags rnams mthong bar 'gyur/ /yi dgas rnams kyis chu ni me chen dmyal bar song ba'i mi rnams dag gis kun nas gcod 'bigs so/ 192 / 'di rnams sgrol ba'i slad du sras dang bcas ba rgyal ba'i bdag po las kyi sar ni rab zhugs te/ /mngal ni rab tu bzung ba mdzad cing mchog gi thugs rje dag gis byang chub bskyed pa mdzad nas ni/ /nyon mongs dang ni bdud rnams bcom nas sa yi steng gi gnas su chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor te/ /sprul pa sgyu ma mdzad nas slar yang bcom ldan 'das ni dag pa'i sku can de nyid kho na'o/ 193 /de phyir rgyal ba'i bdag po'i sku ni skyes shing ma nyams srid pa gsum po la yang gnas pa ste/ /bcom ldan de yis thams cad dus su sems can don ni mi 'dor las kyis bcings pa ma yin no/ /de ltar 'jig rten dbang phyug bdag ni srid pa gsum gyi gnas su las kyi sar gnas nyi ma kye/ /sems can rnams la lam ni sbyin byed dmyal ba'i 'jigs 'phrog lha gzhan dag ni nam yang ma yin no/ 194 /gang dag chos la mngon 'joms rang lus gzhan gyi lus dang rang gi bud med dag la rjes su chags/ /shi bar gyur na bu yi me yi sbyin sreg dang ni gnyen gyi bsod nams dag las mtho ris te/ /mchod sbyin la ni phyugs rnams 'tshe dang g.yul du shi bar gyur na mtho ris 'jig rten dag tu

240
077-120b 'jug /'jug ngogs lus po lhung las mchog gi go 'phang 'gro ba de rnams thar pa ster ba'i chos ma yin/ 195 /de nyid lam ni rnam par spangs nas 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'phrog pa khyod kyi ma gang pha ni gang / /mchog gi bu dang bu mo spun zla chung ma sring mo rnams dang rje bo gnyen gyi sde ni gang / /bdag gis byin gyis brlab pa'i drang srong 'di rnams 'khor lo'i dbus 'dir gang gis thar bar 'gro 'gyur ba/ /de yis nyi ma khyod kyis thub pa rnams ni bdag gi tshig las rigs gcig dag la 'jug par mdzod/ 196 /gal te lus la dbyug pa bsnun pas sdug bsngal 'gyur na de la dbyug pa dag ni nyes pa can/ /dbyug pa 'di ni ma yin lag pas rab tu bskul te 'dir ni nyes pa mtha' dag lag pa yi/ /'di ni ma yin sems kyis bskul te sems kyang 'dir ni gdug pa chen po khro ba'i me yis so/ /de phyir khro ba'i me 'di 'gro ba'i dgra bo bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gsod par 'gyur/ 197 /chags las sdang sogs skyon te rab mchog lha mi rnams kyi rang 'dod chung ma gzhan dang 'grogs las so/ /de ni rtsa nas dbyung slad mtha' dag rgyal sras rnams kyis de ni 'dod pa'i sbyin la rab tu byin/ /de phyir sbyin la rjes su chags pa bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba bsod nams dag gi tshogs 'di ni/ /'jig rten gsum gyi gnyen du gyur cing thams cad dus su skye bo rnams kyi dmyal ba'i 'jigs pa 'phrog 198 / chags pa gang gis sems can rnams ni nyams par gyur pa de yis skyob pa rnams ni grol ba ste/ /sems can rnams kyis nyin zhag so so'i dus su gang zhig srung byed de ni skyob rnams ster bar byed/ /sems can rnams kyis rang snying la gnas bde ba gang zhig gtong byed de ni rgyal rnams srung bar mdzad/ /des na rgyal ba mchog gi spyod pa 'di ni lha klu lha min rnams kyis bya ba dka' bar 'gyur/ 199 /sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha' yon tan yid dang blo dang ngar 'dzin srog dang ni/ /gzugs la sogs dang mig

241
077-121a la sogs pa yul dang yul can rnams dang las kyi dbang po lnga rnams te/ /phyugs dang bcas pa mi yi lus la khyab byed 'di rnams dag las rigs ni thu bo gzhon nu gang / /mi bdag dang bcas mi yi bla ma rigs dregs nga rgyal can khyod gang gis rigs ni thu bo yin/ 200 /bsreg bya sa dang dri ma med pa chu ru rab tu 'gyur te tut+tha ka ni me nyid do/ /rlung dang nam mkha' 'dres pa'i khams ni g.yo ba dang bcas ri bong can dang mtshal ni bdun pa yang / /kA k+Shi kA shi sa dang mu zi mnyam dang mkha' rlung me dang chu ni ldong ros ba bla ste/ /btsag ni sa 'o lan tshwa gang zhig ze tsha rgya mtsho skyes dang rgyam tsha nag po thab kyi tsha/ 101 /'di rnams sa sogs khams te slar yang 'dir ni nA bsA ra ya bak+Shar sad+dza dang / /tsha la k+Sha tsa las skyes de rnams mkha' dang rlung me chu dang sa rnams dag gi rang bzhin no/ /rdo yi chu ni sa ru 'gyur te ri bong can gyi chu ni chu dang me yi chu ni me/ /rlung dang stong pa'i rang bzhin dag gi dug gi chu dang gzhan pa gri gug gsum gyi rang bzhin no/ 202 /gla sgang ser po sa yi khams te shak+tu ka dang rwa can nag po chu dang me dang rlung / /nag po brtsegs pa stong pa zhes bya gzhan pa nye ba'i dug ni rnam pa lnga po rig par bya/ /rdo dang srog gi ngo bo rnam pa sna tshogs 'bras bu dang mtshungs mgo dang dung la sogs pa'i gzugs/ /de dag rnams kyi lcags ni rnam drug lhang tsher skyes dang de bzhin lha dang khab len rnam pa bzhi/ 203 /ro ni grub dang grub pa ma yin rnam pa gnyis su 'dir 'gyur 'bugs byed dang ni 'bugs byed min/ /grub pa lcags ni 'bugs par byed de slar yang de ni zos pas lus kyang 'bugs par byed pa'o/ /gang zhig 'bugs byed min pa'i dngul chu ro de bskol ba dang ni bsgyur bar gyur pa dag gis kyang / /lcags ni 'bugs shing rjes su 'bugs te mtha' dag nad 'phrog rus pa'i lcags ni rnam par spangs nas so/ 204 /dang por du ba'i rang bzhin dag gis 'gro ste me la gnas shing bskol ba de ni rim pa yis/ /sgra dang rab tu 'phar ba yis

242
077-121b te de yang 'dar ba dang ni 'dar med nyid du rab tu 'gyur/ /sgra ldan 'phar ldan 'bugs par byed pa ma yin de yang 'dab ma 'bugs byed 'dar dang bcas pa ste/ /'dar ba med pa mdung gis 'bugs byed rnam gsum 'dir yang sgyur byed rnams kyis bsgyur bar gyur pa'o/ 205 /mchog gi sman gyi stobs kyis stobs dang ldan par rab tu 'gyur te lcags rnams thams cad bzhu ba'o/ /su zhig de rnams med na sa yi steng gi gnas su 'di yi bcing ba dag ni gang zhig byed/ /bcings nas mkha' la spyod pa nyid du 'gyur zhing de bzhin zos na 'chi ba dag kyang nyams par 'gyur/ /ye shes med na sa bdag rnams kyis ro yi dbang po 'di ni rab tu 'bad pas bsgrub par bya/ 206 /de dag rnams kyi rdzas ni du ma glu dang rol mo'i mngon par sbyor ba la yang 'god par 'gyur/ /gang zhig chud zos de ni mi bdag ro yi yul la ma bsregs chos kyi bya ba la ma byin/ /gang zhig rdzas ni sdig pa'i slad du zad par byed pa de yis de ni sdig pa dag gis bcings/ /de phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems can dag gi don gyi slad du ma lus pa ni zad par mdzad/ 207 /gang zhig byugs pas 'phral la zangs kyi 'dab ma'i dri ma 'phrog par byed pa dag ni sman yin te/ /mtha' dag nad 'phrog lcags rigs 'ju bar byed pa de ni skal ldan rnams kyi sa la mthong bar 'gyur/ /gzhan dag rnams kyis 'di yi bcing bar rab tu 'gyur ba gang de nges par lo dus bar dang ni/ /bdug dang dgod pa'i sbyor ba rnams kyis de ni stong phrag gcig 'bugs dag las lhag par mi 'gyur ro/ 208 /sman rnams thams cad shin tu tsha ba'i ro rnams dag dang 'gyur byed sde dang skyur ba'i sde rnams dang / /bslang bar gyur pa'i rtsab mo dag gis rtag tu mnye dang bdug par yang ni rab tu 'gyur ba ste/ /dngul chu rnams ni dngul du bya ba la yang me tog btab pa rnams kyis sa bon dag pa'o/ /

243
077-122a gnyis sbyor tsha la mching bu byi ba rta sen dug rnams kyis so snum gyis bran pas 'jam pa nyid/ 209 /glang po mi yi chu ni lan bdun blugs pa dag gis chu shing tsitra la sogs thal ba dang / /'gyur byed kun dang tsha ba rnams dang slar yang nye ba'i ro ni sbyangs pa de rnams sbru bar bya/ /yang nas yang du me yi tsha ba dag gis slar yang lan brgyar sbru bar bya zhing bskam par bya/ /de bzhin dung gi phye ma brgya phrag sbyar bar gyur pa 'di ni mu zi dag gis bsres pa yang / 210 /lcags rnams zhu bar byed pa'i don du bi Da 'di ni dngul chu dag gi brgyad kyi cha shas 'gyur/ /khyogs kyi bdug pa mtshan mo brgyad de ro yi snying gar gnas pa zhu bar gyur pa ji srid nyid/ /drag por bskol bas dri ma med pa 'di ni mnyes shing bzhus pas stobs dang ldan par rab tu 'gyur/ /lcags gcig zhu bar gyur na nyi ma ri bong can gyi lus kyis lcags rnams thams cad kha sgyur byed/ 211 /khyab byed sgyur ba de yang chen po dang bcas zha nye gsha' tshe spra tshil bcas pas 'jug pa ste/ /de ltar gang zhig dngul chu'i las ni 'chad par 'gyur ba dag gis nyin zhag so sor byed pa na/ /dus gzhan dag gis 'ching ste gsal bar lci zhing sra ba nyid dang skyon rnams kun las rab tu grol/ /de yi mchog gi lus la nad dang 'chi ba dang ni dbul ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad 'phrogs par byed/ 212 /khru phyed gser gyi pad+ma nor gyi 'dab ldan dag la lte bar snying po'i dbus su rdo rje ste/ /lha dang gshin rje nor sbyin dag tu dag pa'i in+d+ra nI la pad+ma rA ga chu shel lo/ /nub tu rin chen karke ta ste me dang lha min 'phrog byed du ni rnon po zangs dang dngul/ /rlung gi 'dab ma dag la gser dang gser gyi lhang tsher dag las skyes pa'i gdan ni lte ba la/ 213 /snying por de steng gser las skyes pa'i dzib+ha la ni phyag gnyis ne'u le dang bcas mchog sbyin pa/ /'dab ma rnams la gser las skyes pa'am dngul las skyes pa'i lha mo brgyad de chu skyes mchog sbyin phyag /cod pan sangs

244
077-122b rgyas rin chen dbang po nor bu mchog sbyin phyag ste gnod sbyin mo rnams de bzhin nyid/ /ha sogs thung ngu ring po phyogs dang phyogs bral 'dab ma rnams la yi ge brgyad rnams rim pas so/ 214 /dri dang me tog rnams kyis nyin zhag so so'i dus su thun gsum zla ba'i snod du mchod byas nas/ /auM dzaM swA hA'i mthar ste dbus su b+ha la dang bcas dza len+dz+rA ya zhes pa sngags 'di yis/ /rgyal po rab dga'i yid kyis gser 'gyur mkhan rnams dag gis srung ba'i don du chu ni rab sbyin bya/ /de ltar bsrung ba'i mthu yis 'byung po'i mgon dang klu yi mgon pos ro ni 'phrog par mi 'gyur ro/ 215 /so phag 'gyur byed skyur ba'i sde rnams dag gis nyi ma bcu ru ro ni mnye zhing bdug par bya/ /de nas slar yang snyigs ma dag la gnas pa phye nas bsre bar bya ste thams cad dus su'o/ / slar yang gal te snyigs las de ni ma phyed ro ni 'chi ste de yang de la bzhu bar bya/ /dngul chu rang gi skye gnas za na de ni slar yang gzhan gyi skye gnas thams cad rab tu za/ 216 /zha nye rnon po ra gan zangs dang lhang tsher skyes sam gzhan pa zhing las skyes pa rnam dag pa/ /mnyam pa gcig tu bsres pa'o dngul gyi bya ba la ni lhang tsher dkar po las skyes gsha' tshe mnyam/ /dang por drug cu'i cha shas zas ni 'ju bar 'gyur zhing de nas cha re bskyed pas 'phel bar bya/ /rkang pa'i cha shas ji srid nyid du rab tu 'gyur te de las lhag par rab tu sbyin mi bya/ 217 /phyogs gcig gis ni nyis 'gyur 'ju bar 'gyur te slar yang 'di ni de bzhin sa bon rnam par dag /de ltar gnyis gsum brgyad 'gyur 'ju bar 'gyur te slar yang zhu ba 'di ni bi Da mchog rnams kyis/ /ma zhu na ni ro la ji srid mtshan mo brgyad kyi bar du 'khor lo'i dugs su rab tu 'gyur/ /reg pa mchog gi sman rnams dag gis me la gnas pa lhang tsher lcags ni kha med 'ju bar 'gyur/ 218 /lhang tsher dag las lcags ni brgyad 'gyur stobs su 'gyur te de ni zhu ba na

245
077-123a yang brgyad 'gyur ro/ /de yis sa bon la yang brgyad 'gyur yin te slar yang de las rdo rje rin chen brgyad 'gyur ro/ /de ltar lcags dang rin chen rnams dang nye ba'i ro dang ro rnams ji srid khol bar gyur gyi bar/ /me yi nang du bskol bar bya ste de nas de ni 'bum phrag du ma 'bugs par rab tu 'gyur/ 219 /reg rdo sman dag med na mchog gi bi Da mnye ba dag dang dug rnams kyis kyang 'ju bar 'gyur/ /'dar ba med pa ji srid nyid de de nas sgyur byed gser ni mnyam pa dag tu rab tu 'gyur/ / slar yang gzhan ni gnyis dang sum 'gyur gser bzhu'i khu ba 'bru mar dngul chu dag la blugs pas so/ /rdzas kyi don du zha nye brgyad cha gser zhun khu ba dag la rab tu 'bad nas blugs par bya/ 220 /gser dngul bya ba dag la gser rnon sprul zangs zha nye mtshal dang ldong ros mu zi dag gis dang / /gsha' tshe zla ba de bzhin lhang tsher skyes kyang ba bla dang ni bsreg bya dag gis bsad byas nas/ /mnyam pa'i 'gyur byed dug dang lan tshwa nye ba'i ro rnams dag dang lcags dang mnyam pa'i dngul chu ni/ /mkhris pa skyur po dag gis nyin zhag bcu ru mnyes nas de ni rdo ba'i dbus su blugs byas te/ 221 /sa yi nang du zla ba drug tu steng du me dang bcas pas thams cad dus su bdugs gyur pa/ /dngul chu de ni bcu drug cha yis dbyangs kyis drangs pa 'bugs par byed par rab tu 'gyur te slar/ /zangs dang zla ba gser mnyam dge ba'i gser 'di gser 'gyur mkhan rnams dag gi sdug bsngal 'joms pa ste/ /dngul ni brgyad kyi cha shas byin na dag pa'i zangs ni phug pa dngul du yang ni 'gyur ba yin/ 222 /'dzin ma la ni rdo ba gang dag 'bras bu'i lus dang mtshungs shing dung dang mgo la sogs pa'i gzugs/ /de yi skye gnas de rnams la byin mar dang sbrang rtsi dang bcas drag po'i rlung gis bzhu bar bya/ /de nas slar yang btags pa dang

246
077-123b ni tsha la 'gyur byed sde tshan rnams kyis dag par byas nas ni/ /lcags kyi skye gnas de ni shes nas nyis 'gyur dag kyang ro la gser 'gyur mkhan gyis bzhu bar bya/ 223 /nyin zhag bdun du snod ni dag par 'gyur te 'bras bu gsum po ro mnyam bskol ba'i chu dang ni/ /sman gyis bsad pa'i lcags kyi phye ma mar dang sbrang rtsi dag dang bcas pa dngul chu dang bcas dang / /ba yi 'o ma gsar pa rnying pa sA li zan ni lo ma skyur pos dman zhing lan tshwa dang / /rnam bral nya dang 'bru mar sogs las grol ba zos pa dag gis phyogs kyi nang du mi rnams kyi'o/ 224 /stong phrag 'bugs pa brgya yis bsgyur ba'i brgya dang bye ba 'bugs pa ji srid par yang shes byas nas/ /nyin zhag so so'i dus su bza' bar bya ste yungs kar cha las mtha' ma skye tshe cha shas so/ /khang bzangs dang ni sa yi khang pa grang ba rlung dang tshad pa dag dang bral bar rab tu 'gyur/ /'bring po 'di ni zla ba drug gis lha yi lus po skra dkar gnyer ma dag dang bral bar byed/ 225 /karko TI dang de ba dA lI tsha gsum br-i ha tI dang nim pa ki rA ta tig ta/ /bskol ba 'thungs te slar yang ma zhu ba la nyin zhag gsum du bsnyung bar gnas pa rab tu bya/ /de bzhin zla ba'i chu la sogs pa me dang dug gi chu dang rdo dang b+hal+lA ta yi chu/ /ngan pa'i dri dang sa dang rdo ba dug gi sha dang brtags pa gzhan rnams la yang sngags pas so/ 226 /gang zhig zos na drag tu rgyal ba ster byed dug dang mtshungs pa de rnams mtha' dag sman yin te/ /phye mar byas nas de ni cung zad mar dang sbrang rtsi dang bcas bza' bar bya ste de bzhin nyid/ /gsal bar mi phyugs sems can rnams kyis gang zhig za bar byed pa de ni grub ster sman ma yin/ /de dag rnams la 'chi ster mchog tu 'jigs byed gang yin de ni rnal 'byor rnams la bdud rtsir 'gyur/ 227 /daN+DotA la sA li par+Ni chu skyes sA ri dag gi rang lus

247
077-124a 'dab ma'i khu ba yis/ /ro dang mu zi mnyam pa khab len snod du lcags kyis nyin zhag gsum dag tu yang mnyes byas nas/ /gang zhig zla ba drug tu nyin zhag so so'i dus su TaM ka'i rkang pa'i tshad ni za byed pa/ /de ni mdze la sogs pa'i nad las grol zhing skra dkar gnyer ma dang bral brgyad gnyis lo lon dbyibs/ 228 /pok+kA Na dang bar snang shak+tu kI ra'i mchu yis rab g.yo dngul chu dag kyang gsad par bya/ /sman gzhan dag gis gsad pa la ni dmar ring lhang tsher skyes dang gser dang khab len mnyam pa dag /gcig tu byas nas srog bcas dri ma rnam bral dngul chu dag la srang drug gis ni gong bu ste/ /sngar brjod khab len snod du chur khu dag gis bskol bar gyur pa gnyer ma dang ni skra dkar 'phrog 229 /zla ba drug dang gnyis gcig zla ba mi bdag dang bcas nyin zhag bcu dang zhag bdun zhag gsum dang / /zhag dang skad cig gcig gis 'di yi mthu dag las ni lus la dngos grub tu yang rab tu 'gyur/ /thun mong ba dang 'bring po 'jigs pa dag dang rnam par bral ba mchog ni ye shes grub pa ste/ /mchog sman skyes bu'i rang gis byas pa'i dge dbang las te skye ba gcig gi rjes 'bugs dag las min/ 230 /gang la 'khri shing ljon pa gzhan gyi dngos dang nyin zhag so so'i dus su dud 'gro rnam par rtsod/ /ral gri dag la pad+ma'i skud pa'i sdong bu mi yi snum gyi mar mes gter ni gsal bar byed/ /der ni nyin zhag so so'i dus su 'byung po'i bdag po dag gi sngags kyi bzlas pa rab tu bya/ /ji srid brko ba'i mtshan mar gyur gyi bar te de nas sngags pa rnams la rdzas kyi dngos grub bo/ 231 /dang por rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa skye gnas drug gi sngags rnams bsgrub par bya/ /gnod sbyin mo rnams bsgrubs nas slar yang sa gzhi la ni zhing du smra ba rnams kyang bsgrub par bya/ /klu mo rnams ni bsgrub pa

248
077-124b byas nas bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu'i ro dang sman de rnams ni bsgrub par bya/ /mkha' 'gro ma rnams bsgrub pa byas nas mchog tu 'jigs par byed pa'i lha min rnams kyang bsgrub par bya/ 232 /klu la sogs rnams bsgrub pa byas nas rab mchog lha dang mi rnams rnal 'byor pa yis bsgrub par bya/ /du ba la sogs bsgrub pa byas nas 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa byed pa'i dbu ma dag ni bsgrub par bya/ /srog la sogs rnams bsgrub pa byas nas ri bong 'dzin pa zhu ba'i thig le rnams ni bsgrub par bya/ /dam pa'i bde ba bsgrubs nas lhan cig skyes pa rgyal ba'i sku ni kun tu 'gro ba bsgrub par bya/ 233 /sems can rnams la 'chi ster gang de grub pa'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs pa mtha' dag bdud rtsi ste/ /'dod pa'i dngos grub gang zhig bgrod bya min pa de yang srid gsum gnas su bsam gtan bgrod bya'o/ /ye shes gang zhig rnyed dka' dag kyang rdo rje pad+mar bde bas byin brlabs rnyed pa sla ba nyid/ /de lta de ltar rdo rje can te srog chags rnams la thams cad dus su bde mnyam ster gyur cig 234 /sgra gcan me dang zla ba nyi ma bzhi por brjod de sa chu bsreg za rlung dang stong pa gang / /lnga po dag go gza' yi tshogs pa cig shos dag ni drug po lhun po 'di yi phyogs rnams su/ /gling rnams dag ni bzhi por rab tu 'gyur te yul rnams dag ni lnga por phyi rol dag tu gsungs/ / snying stobs la sogs yon tan rnams ni gsum po gzhan pa 'di'o lus kyi dbus su de bzhin nyid/ 235 /pad+mar rnam shes dga' ba khrag dang bdud rtsi zhes pa dang por bzhi po dag go de las ni/ /gang zhig rus pa la sogs mtha' dag rnams kyang lnga po de nas mig la sogs pa drug po ste/ /lag pa rkang pa dag ni bzhi po lag pa rkang pa la gnas sor mo rnams ni lnga po'o/ /de rnams tshigs ni gsum po gang zhig 'dir ni rim pa mtha' dag rigs 'di la ni rig par bya/ 236 /sa 'dzin de nyid rab dbye

249
