077-125a rnams dang ro yis bsgyur ba'i ro dang nyi ma nyi shu zhes pa dang / /dbye ba drug cu mi rnams dag gi mtha' dag lus la gnas pa bug pa drug dang zla ba'i grangs/ /de dag thams cad bsdus pa sum 'gyur dgu ru 'gyur te lnga bcu rtsa bzhi srog gi rgyu ba dang / /gza' rnams dag gi rgyu ba gang de slar yang cig shos rnams kyis rnal 'byor ma yi rgyu bar brjod/ 237 /ye shes nam mkha' gnyis dang slar yang gzhan pa 'di ni theg pa dag dang dkon mchog gsum po yang / /nyon mongs bdud dang gnas rnams dang ni slar yang nges par rdzu 'phrul rkang pa zag pa rnams dag dang / /mi 'jigs pa dang bden pa rnams dang slar yang de bzhin dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yang dag par/ /bsdu ba bzhi yi mtha' rnams rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rdo rje rnams kyis rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya/ 238 /mngon shes lnga dang stobs dang lta ba rnams dang rab mchog rgyal ba'i bdag po dag gi spyan lnga dang / /de bzhin phung po dbang po dran pa zhes pa drug dang byang chub yan lag bdun dang mchod pa ni/ /bdun te lam gyi yan lag brgyad rnams so sor legs 'jug gzugs can rnam par thar pa brgyad rnams dang / /bug pa zhes bya yan lag dgu ni gsung rab mchog ste sa rnams dag ni phyogs kyi tshad yin no/ 239 /sangs rgyas rnams kyi phyogs kyi stobs dang gsal bar dbang bcu dang ni yan lag bcu gnyis rten 'brel dag /skye ba dang ni 'gog pa dag go de bzhin nyis 'gyur dgu ni ma 'dres pa yi sangs rgyas chos/ /rab mchog rgyal ba'i bdag po'i mtshan ni sum cu rtsa gnyis dag dang dpe byad rnams kyang brgyad cu ste/ /khyab bdag mchog gi go 'phang 'di dag mtha' dag sngags pa yis ni lus la bsgom par bya ba yin/ 240 /zla ba'i rang bzhin gcig ste zung dang lag pa mig dang 'khrig pa phyogs dang bgrod pa dag ni gnyis/ /'jig rten dus dang yon tan me ni gsum mo chu gter

250
077-125b dus dang rig byed dag ni bzhi ru brjod/ /mda' dang 'byung ba dbang po rnams ni nges par lnga ru rab tu 'gyur te ro dang dus ni drug /gza' dang ri bo thub pa zhes pa bdun gyi grangs te de bzhin klu dang nor ni brgyad yin no/ 241 /rtsa dang bug pa gza' dang gter yang dgu ste phyogs ni bcu dang dbang phyug dag ni bcu gcig go /nyi ma lus med ma nu srid pa gang dang tshes dang mi bdag bcu gnyis nas ni re re 'phel/ /nyes pa 'di dag bcwa brgyad yin te rgyal ba mchog ni ma lus de rnams nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o/ /de nyid ces grags nyi shu rtsa lnga yin te gnyis skyes ces pa sum cu rtsa gnyis nyid du 'gyur/ 242 /rgyud kyi rgyal po thams cad dag tu nges par rdo rje'i tshigs ni rdo rje can gyis sbas pa ste/ /dang po'i sangs rgyas su ni srog chags rnams kyi thar pa'i slad du ma lus pa yang mngon sum gsungs/ /de phyir 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa dag las mtha' dag ma tshang med pa'i rgyu ni bla ma ste/ /dpal ldan rgyud ni dang po'i sangs rgyas mtha' dag rgyal ba'i bdag po'i mngon par brjod pa zla ba bzang / 243 /gang la thog mtha' dbus med gnas dang 'chi dang srid pa dang ni sgra dang dri dang ro dag dang / /reg bya gzugs dang sems med rang bzhin dang ni skyes bu med cing 'ching dang grol dang byed po med/ /sa bon dang ni gsal ba'i dus med mtha' dag srid par sdug bsngal bde ba nyid kyi rang bzhin med/ /mya ngan 'das pa mtshan ma med cing byed pa rnam bral yon tan med pa de la phyag 'tshal lo/ 244 /dus dang sna tshogs la sogs rdo rje skyes bu dpe zla med cing thams cad du 'gro spros pa med/ /brtsegs pa la gnas rna ba sna dang kha dang mig dang mgo ste thams cad nas ni phyag dang zhabs/ /'byung ba'i mtha' ste 'byung po'i mgon po srid pa gsum po mchog 'dzin rgyu rnams dag gi rgyur gyur pa/ /rig pa la sogs rnal 'byor dag gi bgrod bya mchog bde'i go 'phang dus kyi 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal/ 245 /spro byed nus pa'i ngo bo glog gi me dang mtshungs shing nyi ma bcu gnyis dag gi

251
077-126a gzi brjid can/ /ye shes rdo rje'i snang ba mchog gi go 'phang bgrod byed rnam par bcad pa de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dkar po 'jig rten gsum gyi mgon po ri bong 'dzin pa las 'dzag 'jig rten spyi bor yang dag gnas/ /bdud rtsi 'chi ba sel zhing srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms par byed pa thig le'i gzugs la phyag 'tshal lo/ 246 /sems tsam sngags kyi ngo bo lha yis yongs su bskor ba sdug bsngal dang ni bde ba'i rang bzhin te/ /dam pa rnams la zhi ba'i gzugs ni rang gis byas pa'i nyams myong mi bzad rnams la mi bzad pa/ /gang gis las gang rab byas rang gi sems la cho ga bzhin du de yi 'bras bu de skyed pa/ /'jig rten dbang po sna tshogs gzugs can srid gsum skyed mdzad rdo rje sems dpa' la yang phyag 'tshal lo/ 247 /gcig dang du ma dag kyang gcig cing mnyam dang mi mnyam mnyam pa g.yas dang g.yon dang mdun dang rgyab/ /steng 'og kun nas dkar ljang sna tshogs kha dog chen po gcig gi gzugs te thung ngu ring po dang / /shin tu ring po yon tan med ces yon tan dang bcas bud med skyes pa'ang skyes pa bud med min/ /gang zhig kun gyi rten gcig b+ha ga bzang mo mchog gi b+ha ga khyod la 'dud de khyod la 'dud/ 248 /gang zhig mi yi 'jig rten dag na dpal ldan bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa sdig bral de bdag ste/ /de la gnod pa byas pas srog chags rnams ni nges par dmyal bar 'gyur te 'di la ngo mtshar med/ /de mnyes pa yis bdag ni mgu ste de la khro ba'i me yis khros pa zhes pa chen po'o/ /de nyid sems can rnams la thar ba bde mnyam 'bras ster bu rnams dag gi phyag 'os mchod 'os so/ 249 /sdig can gang yin gang zhig dpal ldan bla ma'i zhabs pad bzang po dag la dus gsum phyag mi byed/ /mi shes gang yin gang zhig rnam mang me tog rnams kyis dus gsum du ni maN+Dal mi byed pa/ /myur du mnar med 'gro ba gang yin gang zhig bde mnyam ster byed bla ma skyo ba skyed pa po/ /shes rab ye shes thob pa gang yin ma nyams gang zhig mchog gi bla ma'i zhabs ni mi spong ba/ 250 /nyams pa gang

252
077-126b yin gang zhig rtsa gsum dag la gnas pa'i rlung ni mtha' yas dus su bsad pa'o/ /dpa' bo gang yin gang zhig mnyam dang mi mnyam lam la srog dang thur sel rlung ni gsod byed pa'o/ /sbyin bdag gang yin gang zhig dpal ldan bla mar rang lus bu dang chung ma la sogs thams cad ster/ /ma rabs gang yin gang zhig slu byed rang gi snying gi sdig pas drangs pa'i sems dang g.yo sgyu can/ 251 /dpal ldan dpal gyi chos kyi 'khor lo lha yi mchog gis btud pa'i gdan ni kha dog sna tshogs pa/ /de la sangs rgyas lha dang mi yi bla ma nye bar bzhugs pas zla ba'i zhu ba rtogs pa na/ /sems can don gyi slad du mi yi bdag po rgyud kyi rgyal po dang po'i sangs rgyas gsungs pa gang / /de yang da lta bdag gis de rnams A li kA li nyung ngu'i rgyud du bkod do nyi ma kye/ 252 /sangs rgyas kyis ni gsungs pa dag las dus kyi 'khor lo bdag gis phreng 'dzin sdeb sbyor bcings pas brjod/ /pad+ma dkar po rdo rje 'dzin pa khyod kyis 'di ni sngags pa rnams la bstan pa nyid du mdzod/ /ji ltar nyi ma dang bcas thub pa'i rigs ni shes rab ye shes thob pa 'di las byung gyur pa/ /rnam gsum srid pa la gnas sems can rnams ni dus kyi 'khor lo'i drin las de bzhin 'gyur bar shog 253 /nyi ma khyod dam mi dbang phyi mar gyur pa'i srid par dus kyi 'khor lo'i rnal 'byor gcig las ni/ /tshangs pa'i rigs 'di las skyes mi yi bdag po grags pa bdag ni 'jam dbyangs bdag gi dga' ma ni/ /dpal ldan sgrol ma pad dkar can ni yon tan kun ster 'jig rten mgon po chu skyes mtshan ma can/ /ut+pal sdong bu yis ni rang gzhan la gnas srid pa thams cad don ni ji lta bzhin du ltos/ 254 /ut+pal sdong bu yis ni rang gzhan la gnas srid pa thams cad don ni ji lta bzhin mthong nas/ /thub pa'i dbang po rnams dang lhan cig nyi mas cod pan bcas pa'i mgo dang lag pa dag gis ni/ /rigs ldan zhabs kyi pad+mar phyag dag 'tshal nas smras pa ston pa gcig pu mchog gi thugs rje yis/ /thub pa'i rigs ni 'jigs rung 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dag

253
077-127a las phyung nas ye shes lam la gzhag par mdzod/ 255 /khyod ni rgan yang gzhon nu mtha' dag rgyal ba'i sras po yin yang thog mar dang po'i sangs rgyas khyod/ /bud med sbyor zhing tshangs par spyod ldan mchog gi thugs rje dag gis 'jig rten gnyen te gshin rje'i dgra/ /khyod ni zhi yang rdo rje bzang po 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'phrog pa khyod ni rtag tu bdud kyi bdud/ /khyod ni grol yang srid pa 'dir ni 'gro ba smin pa'i don du grags pa khyod ni rab tu 'jug 256 /tshangs pa'i rigs las nyi ma bdag ni thub pa'i rigs kyis btud par gyur pa zhabs kyi rtsa bar lhung / /sems can rnams kyi thar pa'i slad du dus kyi 'khor lo mtha' dag sa la rab tu gsal bar byas/ /rigs ldan rigs la khyod ni nyi ma sa bdag gis btud dpal ldan grags pa dpal ldan ka lA par/ /khyod kyi zhabs kyi pad+ma dag la 'jigs rung 'khor bas 'jigs pa dag ni skyabs su lhag par mchi/ 257 /sa ga'i zla ba'i nya la mtshan mo'i dus ni 'das shing nyin par rab tu ma zhugs pa dag la/ /thub pa'i skye bo dang bcas nyi ma sna tshogs gtso bos byin gyis brlabs pas phyag rgya'i dngos grub thob/ /sems can rnams kyi thar pa'i slad du bdag gi thugs kyi rdo rje mtha' dag sa la gnas pa bzhin/ /dus kyi 'khor lo'i mthu las sems can nyid rnams dag gi rnam gsum srid pa dag la gnas gyur cig 258 /sems can kun don mdzad pa po yis mchog gi thugs rje dag gis rgyud kyi don ni bstan mdzad nas/ /sras po pad+ma dkar po rab mchog yon tan dag gi gter la gnang ba stsal ba nges par ni/ /dang por khyod kyis rgyud kyi rgyal po mtha' dag ma tshang med pa glegs bam dag la gnas pa dang / /de nas rang gi 'dod pas 'grel bshad byas nas gzhan gyi gnas su bgrod par bya'o 'jig rten gnyen/ 259 /gang dag steng na bdud kyi phyogs gnas lha ma yin rnams mchog tu 'jigs byed byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /mi yi 'jig rten dag na phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas khro

254
077-127b po'i rgyal po btsun mor bcas pa rnams/ /gang dag sa 'og dag na gdengs can dbang po gdon tshogs mi dge thams cad dus su 'ching byed pa/ /de dag thams cad nyin zhag so so'i dus su mi shes 'jig rten kun nas skyong bar byed gyur cig 260 /rgyud ni dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo shin tu bsdus pa ma lus rdo rje sems dpa' lhag pa'i lha/ /thabs dang shes rab gcig sbyor rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rdo rje dag gis de nyid rnam pa bcu drug pa/ /sems can rnams kyi thar pa'i slad du rgyal ba'i bdag pos gsungs shing bdag gis kyang ni bstan pa gang / /bsod nams de yis sems can thams cad 'gyur med mchog gi bde bar gyur cig de la 'dud gyur cig 261 /dang po'i sangs rgyas stong phrag bcu gnyis pa las phyung ba dpal dus kyi 'khor lo las ye shes kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// //mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas las phyung ba/ rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal dus kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //kha che'i paN+Di ta so ma nA tha dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba 'bro dge slong shes rab grags kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa las/ dus phyis yon tan phul du byung ba dpag tu med pas spras pa'i bla ma dam pa chos kyi rgyal po'i bka' lung dang / dpon chen shAkya bzang po'i gsung bzhin du/ mkhas pa chen po zhang ston mdo sde dpal dang / dus kyi 'khor lo'i tshul khong du chud pa'i dge slong tshul khrims dar gyis don gyi cha la legs par dpyad cing bskul te/ legs par sbyar ba'i skad kyis brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos rig pa'i dge slong shong ston gyis/ dpal sa skya'i gtsug lag khang chen por yul dbus kyi rgya dpe gnyis la gtugs shing legs par bcos te gtan la phab pa'o// //gang gis thugs dgongs rnam par dag pa yis/ /'di la bskul zhing mthun rkyen bsgrubs pa dang / /bdag gis 'bad las bsod nams gang thob des/ /kun gyis 'di rtogs sangs rgyas sar gnas shog/ //
